FireAll PopulateOptions
text:
"A good deal," the $post says as your payment is transferred. $HeOrShe immediately executes the datastream to transfer the agreed-upon hyperspace and slipstream data.

"Pleasure doing business with you," $heOrShe adds.
$HeOrShe takes your denial in good spirit and asks if there is anything else you wished to discuss.
"Now don't be blaming me if you get lost out here," $heOrShe says with good humor.
"Providence provides for those that provide for themselves, you know." $heOrShe says charitably.
"Pity," $heOrShe says. "Now you be careful out here; you wouldn't want to get eaten by ghosts."
"I hate missing out on a profitable deal, but I respect your position," $heOrShe says.

script:
FireBest BarShuttleDownPrintDesc
FireBest BarPrintDesc
BarCMD showOptions

text: 你搭乘穿梭机来到主港区内，很快就找到了一家看起来还不错的店。

As you enter the bar you are buffeted by the human white-noise of conversation and revelry. Ad-holos buzz softly from ceiling-mounted units, shining garish highlights through glasses and bottles as spacer crews mingle with merchants and locals trading drinks for rumor, jobs, and opportunities.

刚踏入酒吧，谈话的喧嚣立即扑面而来。坐在廉价吧台后的太空人看到了你，脸上止不住地掠过一丝震惊。他和同伴推了推坐在一旁的商人，还指了指你。一片寂静开始在酒吧里蔓延开来，只有全息广告装置依旧轻声作响，在杯盏之间投射着艳俗的广告。

有几群人起身离开了，临走前不忘酸溜溜地瞪了你一眼。一个太空人向你的脚下吐了口唾沫，低声咒骂了一句什么。你的卫兵把手放到了武器上，但暂时没有拔出来的必要。你找到了明显比之前安静了许多的吧台，在你走向那边时，大部分的酒客都尽力假装没看到你。

As you enter the bar you are buffeted by the white-noise of conversation. A spacer at a cheap table looks at you with a double-take of recognition. They elbow their drinking companions, stand, and aggressively - unsteadily - approach you. At three meters they halt as they just now spot your guards, who have made themselves less inconspicuous.

"You! You can't go doing what you're doing," the spacer finds words are preferable now to a physical altercation. "Throwing i-pulses at the hyperspace beasties and the ghosties. It's bad luck. Bad, bad luck going shoutin' at things yer not meant to!" They've begun shouting at you, which you feel violates the generalized principle. "-'ll be the death of us all!"

The spacer's comrades, eyeing you, pull their loud companion back toward a quiet corner. A few onlookers make corrupted motions of Luddic blessing; spacer signs against ill-omen.
酒座里的各个墙面都装饰着富丽堂皇的镀金几何图形。黑色大理石柱沐浴在冷光管的柔光之下，雍容华贵地悬在空中。在速子公司名利场里打拼的家伙们全都西装革履，在谈生意的同时不断买来价格越来越离谱的鸡尾酒请客。一些太空人则在矮靠背椅上低调地喝着酒，有些局促地瞥着那些若隐若现地从天花板上投影下来的不知是抽象艺术还是全息投影的东西。
昏暗的空间里塞满了呐喊、汗臭和脉动的音乐。正好有两拨海盗船员摆出了要干上一架的样子，惹得酒吧里这群粗野的太空人们大笑起哄，抄起他们手中的杯子给所有的墙和桌面又敲上了一层坑洼和污渍。看来你只能指望在有人拔枪干起来之前，那群全身堆满生化改造的保镖里会出来个人扫一扫大家的兴头。在后面烟雾缭绕的隔间里，犯罪头目和海盗船长们看着这场面有些满意地笑了起来。
刚踏入这明亮而拥挤的地方，你的目光就被缀满墙上的一排排酒水龙头吸引过去。龙头上的瓶装酒产地遍布核心世界的每个星球，甚至还有几种出自界外的酒水。商船舰长和休班军官在酒吧里打成一片，穿着制服的工作人员麻利地穿梭其间。在一个角落里，一群海军学员正高唱呐喊，拼命地享受着他们最后一班的自由。

You enter the bar, leaving the noisome propaganda broadcasts of the throughway behind. Off-duty laborers drink away their ration credits dutifully at benches set beneath Diktat insignia. In one corner a cadre of finely dressed officer-bureaucrats calls for another round. Even here, a larger-than-life holo of the Lion of Sindria looks down on you as you decide what to do.
从进入酒吧的那一刻起，你就感受到了来自联盟世界各地的船员之间求同存异的氛围。不苟言笑的 Kazeron 人身着光鲜的制服喝着烈酒，旁边高傲但落魄的 Mayasura 人则一扎又一扎地灌着稻啤酒。一群 Tyle 船员与几名 Zagan 人舰桥军官边吹牛边拼酒，为卢德教规提倡的节制立了个坏榜样。众多显示屏五光十色地展示着来自联盟各个行星的媒体资讯，而它们的扬声器也为这众人的喧哗平添了一分吵闹。
你低头避开了鼓励节欲与克制的告示牌，走入酒吧。角落的凹室里有人在演奏着某种弦乐器。吧台旁边一排手工制作的茶炊，提醒你这里经常供应茶水，销量可能和吧台上那些劳工大老粗们爱喝的淡啤酒差不多。不少看起来像是外星访客的人和不信教的当地人聚集几张桌台附近，交流买卖着情报，构成了这里最像罪恶巢穴的地方。

A weathered brute from the local vice squad stares rudely as you pass, but does not stop you as you enter the door. They want you to know that they could shut the place down at any time - but an illicit teahouse-bar is a useful conduit with the commerce required to carry out holy war. Inside it is dim, the ceiling low, and the crowd packed. The stench of drug fumes and cheap liquor competes with bodies that disdain modern enzyme soaps.

script:
ShowPersonVisual
CallEvent $ttli_eventRef putValuesInMemory
FireBest PrintTTLIGreeting
FireAll PopulateTTLIOptions
FireAll AdjustTTLIOptions

text:
速子投资人出现在你的通讯屏幕上并马上认出了你。

"哦，我们怎么又见面了，$playerName "$heOrShe说到，"我猜是你的探险事业已经有些赚头了？"
你的速子债权人出现在通讯面板上并立即开口说道，"真是太好了，你还活着。还有如果你能把我们约好的 $ttli_repaymentAmount 还款转给我，那就再好不过了。"
速子投资人出现在了你的通讯屏幕上，$heOrShe双手合十，仿佛已经预见了你的来电。
速子 投资人出现在了通讯屏幕上，仿佛是遇到了什么开心事一样。$HeOrShe似乎是想要说些什么，但在藏于微笑之下细想之后，做了个小动作示意你先说。

options: 10:ttli_extendLoan:冷静地解释你需要更多的时间来还清贷款
100:ttli_neverMind:"对不起，拨错号了。我回头会尽快跟你联系的。"

script:
SetEnabled ttli_payLoan false
SetTooltip ttli_payLoan "你没有足够的星币来偿还贷款。"

text: "和你合作愉快！"$heOrShe露齿一笑，没继续寒暄几句就直接登出了通讯会话。你看着只剩下旋转速子徽标的画面，切断了通讯。
"我们应该找个机会再这样干一回，"$heOrShe说，"这次还蛮有趣的。" 然后连接就断了。

script:
CallEvent $ttli_eventRef extendLoan
CallEvent $ttli_eventRef putValuesInMemory
FireBest TTLIExtendLoanText
CallEvent $ttli_eventRef applyExtendLoanRepLoss

text:
$HeOrShe皱了皱眉头，挤出个还算像人类的失望表情。"我很遗憾听到这个消息，不过..."$HeOrShe忽然又把笑容挂到了脸上。"但我们可以对此特别宽限一次。"

你的还款期限被准许延后 $ttli_extensionDays 天，但需偿还的欠款也被增加到了 $ttli_repaymentAmount。速子 '投资者' 在切断通讯前还郑重说道："请把握好这次机会，否则我们将会采取某些措施，来强调我是有多么看重我们之间的商业伙伴关系。"

看来今后得多多提防了。

$HeOrShe完美地皱起了眉头，并将目光移向一旁，仿佛在自语般地说到："难道是积极性不够？这问题我们该怎么解决？" 随后投资者继续和你交谈，说$heOrShe已经预料到了这种情况，并宽宏大量地将你的还款期限延长 $ttli_extensionDays 天，不过欠款金额被提高到 $ttli_repaymentAmount。在关闭链接前，$heOrShe忽然带着古怪的微笑低声说道："顺便一提，额外的激励措施已经安排上了。"

你觉得自己今后得多提防着些了。

$hisOrHer的脸瞬间变成了一副没有表情的面具。"我明白了，真是不幸。"$HeOrShe看上去像是思索了一小会儿才继续开口，"我懒得浪费时间来细数你之后要面临的报复行为。"$hisOrHer的冷笑到，"真是一笔好买卖。"

然后通讯链接就被掐断了。
$HeOrShe只是稍稍歪过头，让眉头稍微皱了一下。"再见。"$heOrShe这么说了一声，通讯链接就被掐死了。
你急忙切断了通讯，觉得有点尴尬。

id: # TriTach loan, recorded message on next market visit

text: 当你的$shipOrFleet连上了本地通讯网络时，一个警报声提示你的在消息列表里收到了一则重要留言。

script:
CallEvent $global.ttli_unpaidEventRef noPaymentMessage
AddText "你看到了那位速子投资者，$hisOrHer的顶着一张面具般毫无表情的脸。\"真是不幸。\"$HeOrShe看上去像是思索了一小会儿才继续开口，\"我懒得浪费时间来细数你之后要面临的报复行为。\" 记录到这里就戛然而止了。"

CallEvent $global.ttli_unpaidEventRef noPaymentMessage
AddText "你回想起了这个名字，还有出现在屏幕上的速子投资者这副简直不会衰老的面容。\"我很失望。\"在留言结束前，$heOrShe只说了这么一句。"

text:
"你懂的那位让我代$entity.ttli_hisOrHer向你问声好。"赏金猎人大声说道。

通讯链接在一阵静电杂音中被掐死了。

id: # scientist/AI core bar event, cache interaction

script:
CallEvent $saic_eventRef putValuesInMemory
FireBest SAICPrintInitialText
ShowDefaultVisual
SetShortcut saic_leave "ESCAPE"
options:
saic_giveCore:将核心放入学者提供的屏蔽箱内，并尽快寄出
saic_takeCore:将 AI 核心据为己有
saic_leave:离开

text:
你的$shipOrFleet到达了之前在 $saic_marketName 酒吧里遇到的学者所提供的坐标位置。如$saic_heOrShe所言，这里简直是塞满人之领时期的货物和科技物品的宝库，且基本上原封未动。 你的一名打捞人员向你汇报，在这些物件之中发现了一个带有 速子科技 标志的上了锁的小箱子。它产生了一个奇怪的动态磁场，范围延伸到箱外两米左右。 

令人惊讶的是，之前居然没有任何人发现这个藏匿处。不过刚开始的时候从远程传感器的读数上看，这里的确是被误判成了毫无价值的残骸区。现在眼下的问题是，你是打算把 AI 核心封入屏蔽箱，在下次靠港时将它快递寄走，还是说你打算把它据为己有？毕竟那个学者肯定只是个无足轻重的角色。
屏蔽箱在电动闩滑动就位的声响中锁死了。这时它送出了一个一次性编码的超波突发通信。应该是确认讯号，你猜想到。但如果那个学者能提前跟你提一下这个小把戏就好了，现在只能希望附近没有海盗或是其他什么东西正在监听。
options: saic_continueGiveCore:把藏匿处的其他东西带走

text: 你打开了这曾属于 速子科技 的箱子，从中收获了一枚 Alpha 级核心。随着冰冷的非人类思维被激活，核心脉动着，照亮了你的笑脸。你下令把学者的屏蔽箱扔出气闸。如果你想在这世上有所成就，那最好亲力亲为。
options: saic_continueTakeCore:把藏匿处的其他东西带走

text:
长途冷冻设施是为进行长达数个世纪的星际旅行为目的设计建造的，因此不出意料的，大部分的冷冻舱维持机构的读数显示其运作正常。虽然你的舰队没有能力安全地复苏休眠者，但在 10 光年范围内建立的殖民地可以通过建设低温复苏设施来获得庞大的人口流入量。

你的行政官员提醒你，目前还尚未明确复苏者在殖民地的人口中占比过高是否会引发潜在的生理或心理问题。

当你的$shipOrFleet进入了近距离保持轨道时，你的 TriPad 上的拟 AI 助手帮你显示出了一份关于超空间分流器的规格概要。

舰桥里响起了警报，有几个形状之前没被识别出来东西从超构造体中分离了出来，平稳地朝你的$shipOrFleet加速移动。这时你正好才读到，"...而且出于安全考虑，不再将自主防御无人舰作为标准配置。"

战术副官向你挥手示意有情况要汇报，"我们现在离巨型设施的磁场足够近，预计我们在这里作战可以免受星冕的影响，大概，但..."，他们查看了一下控制台，"敌舰...舰型未知。正快速接近中。" 他们开始显得不安，声音发紧地说到，"这可能是些没遇到过的东西，舰长。"

script:
$crewReq = 1000 0
$metalsReq = 20000 0
$tpReq = 5000 0
ShowResCost crew $crewReq metals $metalsReq true rare_metals $tpReq true
text:
打捞人员在登上了设施的关键部位，并很快回报了大量的损伤与消耗。虽然很难对整个设施进行详细的评估，但很明显，它在目前的状态下是无法运作的。

幸好，和其他大崩塌前最后建造的人之领巨型技术遗物一样，$nameInText 具有奇迹般强大的自主修复能力，只需要提供足够的资源就可以进行自我修复。
该设施看起来运作正常。
该设施目前正在进行自动化的自我修复，应该会在短期内完成。

script:
SetTextHighlights 10 1 "超分流阀门"
FireBest CTapCheckCanAfford
FireBest CTapDisableRepairOptionIfNeeded
text:
你的 TriPad 提供了一个有用的分析结果：如果启动，这个设施允许10光年内的殖民地建立一个额外的工业建筑，前提是在殖民地安装一个超分流阀门，并能保证充足的稀有金属供应。

储存在 TriPad 记忆体中的古老蓝图显示，设施中有一个用于存放这些 "阀门" 的专用货物区，但打捞人员报告说它是空的。

速子科技 居然在他们的标准轨道工业设施专家系统数据库里准备了这么详尽的信息，这让你稍微愣了一下。
options:
0:cTap_repair:提供足以修复结构的资源
100:defaultLeave:离开

script:
RemoveCommodity metals $metalsReq
RemoveCommodity rare_metals $tpReq
$usable = true
$beingRepaired = true 5
FireBest CTapRepairInitiatedText

text:
船员完成了原料的卸载，你向该设施的分散式维修节点发送了激活信号。

一开始几乎没有任何反应，只是由有少数几个之前没发现的中继节点开始在超构造体中相互传递信息。科学专家保证修复速率将会以指数形式成倍增加，并拉出一个显示屏向你展示中继节点的信息传递在逐渐向外扩展，同时能量传输曲线稳步上升。短短的几分钟之后，尽管外观没有什么变化，但传感器显示的总体热输出已经急剧上升。不管是什么，有什么东西正在这个天体级大小的机器的心脏里加速...

"舰长，"科学专家有些犹豫地打断了你的思考，"我们最好让舰队后撤 100 公里左右。"你点点头，下达了命令。

$nameInText 应该在短时间内上线。

id: # arrived at market, debt, check whether some crew leaves
# arrived at market, check whether some mercenary officers try to leave

text: 当你的$shipOrFleet在 $entity.name 停靠时，你收到了来自你的一名雇佣军官的高优先级通讯请求。

"您好，指挥官！我的合同期满了。我有幸感到我们双方都从这个合约中受益匪浅。

现在我打算去挥霍一下自己挣到的这些星币，毕竟一直呆在远离文明世界的船里可没什么机会这么做，不是吗？"

"啊，指挥官。" $HeOrShe一开口就换上了略显沉痛的语气，但却又很明显地想要尽快完成这段让人感到不自在的对话。

"请容许我向您目前面临的资不抵债的财务问题深表同情。

依照我们先前在合约里立下的条款，在目前的情况下我有权选择终止我们的合约。虽然很遗憾，但我不得不选择行使这一权力。"

script: SetStoryOption mercs_convince 1 convinceMerc ui_char_spent_story_point_leadership "延长雇佣军官的合约期限"
options:
mercs_convince:说服$himOrHer延长合约期限
mercs_letGo:祝$himOrHer今后工作顺利
mercs_letGoJerk:谴责$himOrHer不够忠心

text: 你展现出非凡的领袖气质，迎合$hisOrHer的雄心壮志把对方好好夸奖了一番。同时你旁敲侧击，让$himOrHer觉得再坚持干一会儿就会有更好的收获 (当然你没给出具体承诺)。于是你说服$himOrHer延长了合同的期限。
你公事公办地接受了$hisOrHer的决定，互相调侃了几句之后就切断了通讯链接。

script:
MarketCMD mercLeaves
$player.wasJerkToMerc = true 1000
ShowDefaultVisual
EndConversation DO_NOT_FIRE
text: 雇佣兵明显对这种斥责非常反感，当你还在仔细问候$hisOrHer的祖宗的时候，对方就切断通讯挑明了这一点。
你目前无法完成运输合同。

" $entity.dmi_name 叫我代$entity.dmi_hisOrHer向你问声好，" $entity.dmi_hunter 大声说道，"如果你不记得$entity.dmi_himOrHer是谁了，你应该还记得一批委托你运送的 $entity.dmi_commodity 吧！"

通讯链接在一阵静电杂音中被掐断了。

id: # red planet story event - talk to pilot

script:
ShowPersonVisual
CallEvent $psi_eventRef prepare
$talkedTo = true
SetShortcut cutCommLink "ESCAPE"
text:
$personName 用目光上下打量着你。你也打量了回去，发现即使隔着通讯视频，也能看出 $personFirstName 接受过的 "修复" 明显比其他太空船员同僚要更高档。"所以，"$heOrShe一副不出所料的样子说到"你听过那个故事了。"$HeOrShe叹了一口气，扭头骂了一句，"如果那个老不死的能闭嘴就好了..."

"不过，你想去哪儿找麻烦，这不关我鸟事。还有你也不是第一个听到传言找上我的家伙。前面这些警告就当我免费告诉你的好了，告诉我，你觉得这颗行星的位置信息对你来说该值多少？"
options:
0:psi_barter:与 $personName 讨价还价
1:cutCommLink:"当我没问。"切断通讯连接

text: "哦，你又来了，准备好谈价钱了？"
options:
0:psi_barter:与 $personName 讨价还价
1:cutCommLink:"当我没问。" 切断通讯连接

text:
你开始向$heOrShe杀价，指出红色行星那边已经有敌对势力守着 —— 至少据说如此，还有$heOrShe应该已经把这情报卖给过其他人了。"没错，没错，"$heOrShe接口到，"但我可很了解你们这些太空船长是什么人，你们就是喜欢这种神秘的东西，不是吗？你和我都懂，你瞒不住这种兴趣的。"

最终飞行员拿那份情报对你开价 $psi_credits。
options:
0:psi_pay:支付 $psi_credits 来获取神秘红色行星的具体位置
1:cutCommLink:拒绝其开价

script:
SetEnabled psi_pay false
SetTextHighlightColors bad
SetTextHighlights $psi_credits
AddText "不幸的是，你现在手头仅有 $psi_playerCredits 星币"
SetTextHighlights $psi_playerCredits

text:
你进行了星币转账，并收到了需要的坐标。"很高兴认识你。"

$personName 在你反应过来之前就切断了通讯。

你的$shipOrFleet靠近了 $entityName。

传感器难以对笼罩整个地表的薄层巨型结构进行评估。你的传感器技师主动提议，可以给干涉分析仪输入一些不常用的参数设定。在参数被接受的绿灯亮起了数秒之后，次级 AI 便初步分析认定这是一种行星规模的稳定能量场，且具有一些很罕见的特性。
当你的$shipOrFleet靠近时，传感器检测到有多个接触信号出现在了正下方，犹如从浑浊的红色深海之中浮出。
你的$shipOrFleet成功抵近了 $entityName，没有发生其他异常事件。

进一步的扫描显示，能量场并不均一完整，可能是由于能量源已经年久失修。同时你的舰桥人员设法发现了一个从星球表面发出讯号的遇险信标。

该讯号被设定不断重播，并以因为设备老化的而出现了乱码。你从其中可以解读的信息推断，这里是 速子 的机密研究机构。在某一次 AI 战争期间，全自动防御系统对某条紧急安全命令采取了过激的响应，决定击毁任何试图离开这个星球的飞船，导致一支研究小组的部分成员被滞留在了这里。
options:
0:psi_explore:派遣打捞小组前往研究机构
100:defaultLeave:离开

text: 你派出一艘临时加装了护盾发生器的穿梭机，让它突入了护盾的一处破损点。穿梭机在主控制中心顺利着陆，机组人员成功突入设施，将护盾完全解除。随后，携带重型设备的后援穿梭机迅速跟进，开始全面展开打捞作业。

id: # salvage operations on planets with ruins

text: 少量破损的穹状建筑零星散布在星球地表，也许里面还藏有些有价值的物资。
大量的废墟、辐射源讯号与泡沫陶化金属建筑物的独特雷达回波一起广泛地分布在 $marketName 上，印证了这里曾进行过的可追溯到人之领开拓纪元末期的规模虽小但运作协调的殖民活动。

Ruined cities can be found across the surface of $marketName, spilling from their broken hearts pitted roadways and crumbling magrail lines to the skeletons of factories, aquaponics domes, and comm-towers.

$marketName is covered in vast ruins; cities, factories, mines, farms, homes. The dead are in dread abundance, entwined with salvageable materials, goods, tools, and weapons. This world is a tomb for the hubris of the Domain's project of galactic colonization and hegemony.
The ruins on the surface of $marketName have been stripped of anything easily accessible, and further exploitation requires a permanent presence.
Scattered, sinking buoyant platforms dot the clouds of $planet, perchance holding lost caches of valuable materials.

Low-orbit platforms blip with radiation sources and the distinctive burred radar-ping of foamed cerametal can be found widespread through the clouds of $marketName, evidence of a small but concerted colonization effort dating to the late expansion period of the Domain.

Ruined buoyant cities and factories can be seen in the clouds of $marketName, slowly sinking into the crushing depths, trailing kilometers of tether. Low-orbit factories, ring-habs, and comm-relays slowly succumb to atmospheric drag and occasionally but dramatically burn a line across the swirling face of the planet.

The clouds of $marketName are filled with the vast ruins of buoyant sky-cities, dead jewels of farms, habitats, and transport hubs trailing on near-invisible tethers. Low-orbit factories, hab-rings, and power transmitters sparkle in the twilight, a steady slew of debris catching in the atmosphere and burning lines on the face of the planet. The dead are in dread abundance, entwined with salvageable materials, goods, tools, and weapons. This world is a stormy tomb for the hubris of the Domain's project of galactic colonization and hegemony.
The ruins in low orbit of $marketName have been stripped of anything easily accessible. Further exploitation of abandoned buoyant structures requires a permanent presence.
附近的一支敌对舰队正在追踪你的行动，使你无法进行探索。
派出打捞小组能马上搜寻并回收所有可以直接利用的东西，而长期开发这些废墟中的资源需要建立一个殖民地。

你的$shipOrFleet接近了一批漂流在太空中的屏蔽货箱。上面没有身份认证，没有徽章，也没有任何应答装置。

其中一个货箱已与货箱群分离，一边旋转，一边发射冲洗着你的传感器的高能中微子流。这批货箱被遗留在此后已经沉睡了数年甚至数十年 ，肯定是其中的某些储存有奇特物质的储罐泄露了。

一个警告航标在附近的主要通讯频道里发出扭曲的哀嚎声。

通讯官报告，信标残骸中的安全系统试图进行简单的软件黑入，但是被抵挡了下来。

这艘主力舰级别的舰船应该是一艘相位舰，它的设计十分独特。

你的传感器技师说这些非常小但明亮的电磁脉冲源 "仅仅与部分可见光谱重叠". 它们周期性的出现在这艘谜团一般的船上并且被排放出来。舰桥里的船员都开始交头接耳，窃窃私语的猜测着：是某种新型的防御手段？还是微卫星群的推进器激冲？你的传感器技师摇了摇头。

宛如合唱团站在山的那头，遥远的旋律乘风而来，犹如午后清风一样将你的注意力，一点，一点的剥离。但当你试图去追寻这旋律之时，它又随风而去。回过神来时，你意识到整个舰桥的船员都忧心仲仲的看着你，等待你的下一个命令。

script:
$printedDesc = true 0
$fidpi_addContinue = true 0
AddTextSmall "Detailed scan of unknown vessel acquired" highlight
text:
这艘主力舰级别的舰船应该是一艘相位舰，他的设计十分独特。你的传感器技师说这些非常小但明亮的电磁脉冲源 "仅仅与部分可见光谱重叠". 它们周期性的出现在艘谜团一般的船上并且被排放出来。舰桥里的船员都开始交头接耳，窃窃私语的猜测着：新型护盾？等离子暴裂驱动器？你的副官摇了摇头。

你命令你的舰队以最高的清晰度对这艘船进行扫描，并将这批数据放进安全的储存区里。
宛如合唱团站在山的那头，遥远的旋律乘风而来，犹如午后清风一样将你的注意力一点一点地剥离。但当你试图去追寻这旋律之时，它又随风而去。回过神来时，你意识到整个舰桥的船员都忧心仲仲的看着你，等待你的下一个命令。

巨大的爆炸损坏了外部摄像头。过了几秒后备用摄像头才弹出。

传感器技师低沉着声音报告说，刚才的爆炸并未检测到逃生舱。
这艘损坏的相位舰船，终于平静了下来，缓缓地在宇宙中飘荡着。

打捞小组将他们的无人穿梭机部署并对接在这艘巨型船体的各个入口处。在舰桥下令进入的时候，同一时间的所有的遥测信息反馈都消失了。

舰桥立即发出撤退指令，并且联络下属开始执行检查并试图初始化无人机，以精准定位系统故障的位置—同时试图判断这是不是敌对行为。整个舰桥这几分钟都像热锅上的蚂蚁，打捞小组的通讯和数据反馈终于恢复了。

"长官！" 你的战术副官在你面前标准的敬了一个礼，并且开始向你报告状况，"有人试图对我们的穿梭机的内部电脑发送动力系统崩溃指令。幸运的是安全系统及时拦截了它，但我们不得不重启整个系统并且手动切换到备份上；以上是遥测被切断的原因。现在整个打捞小组随时可以出动。"
options: zigAlphaContinue:"无论是谁干的，他*的到底想干什么？"

text:
战术副官快速的摁了几个按钮，全息投影上闪现出了更新过的数据。

"假如在距离残骸这么近的情况下，所有穿梭机的能量核心同时被过载的话会怎么样？那这船体就可能受到严重的损伤，没有修复的希望了。当然也会杀死打捞小组，但我认为这并不是他们的目的，毕竟明显有比这更容易杀死打捞小组的办法。"

当你指示行动长官让打捞小组做好开展第二次尝试的准备的时候，战术副官补充道，"长官，看起来刚刚我们遇到的应该是第二次 AI 战争时 速子科技 用的小把戏罢了。他们会在黑匣子上留下电磁脉冲陷阱，防止 霸主 从他们停机的船体里回收提取有价值的信息和科技。这方法挺管用的，至少管用过一段时间。我还蛮高兴那些旧的通讯链接安全包都还装着没被卸掉。"

你结束了与战术副官的讨论，开始仔细地思考着当前的情况。打捞小组和指挥人员只能维持着呼叫 - 应答确认流程继续原地待命。不久之后，多份来自模拟分析小组军官们的行动分析报告通过指挥系统逐层汇总，集中在了你和你的舰桥组员面前。虽然还未能让你满意，但事件的全貌逐渐被拼凑完全了：这艘舰船上有个装载有 Alpha 核心的安全货舱。发出能量核心崩溃指令的信号源虽然并不在那个货舱内部，但位置近得让人捉摸不透。AI 核心在事件发生时正受到屏蔽，与外界完全隔绝。它拒绝为此事件负责，还积极地自荐要在这一危急时刻为你提供帮助和建议，只要你能好心地帮它打开一个小小的数据链接。你毫不客气地中断了 Alpha 核心的通讯连接，并下令把它重新放进隔离舱。

通讯官在报告的时候说，并不确定这次是 AI 参与了这一事件，还是信号源被故意放在核心附近，以便将怀疑引向核心。不过这两种可能性再细推下去都会令人感到不安。这时行动长官接入了通讯，申请再次进入残骸进行探索。
你的多支打捞小组分别对接在巨型舰船外壳上的各个入口上。

After a few tense minutes, reports start to come in - the vessel is heavily damaged, and though of exotic design, it is theoretically recoverable.

Your operations chief reports that for all of the fancy hull features, it is clear that this ship requires crew to operate. But there are no traces of a crew, not even a single body caught in the battle damage, and the escape pods are all in their berths.

The operation proceeds with telemetry feeds, salvors' reports, and authorization orders flowing around you, through the bridge of your flagship. You catch yourself listening for that unheard music in a quiet moment, and shake your head just as a comms request from your chief engineer appears, bringing you back from your reverie. You accept as a matter of course.

"$PlayerSirOrMadam, if I understand half of these systems, this ship is truly one of a kind," your chief engineer speaks with genuine excitement.

"I've found a device that appears to generate and control - I'm not sure that either is the right word, really - these ... swarming motes, the EM anomalies. The device appears to have two stages, the first as I've described, and what appears to be a later addition which is, unfortunately, damaged beyond repair. Judging by the complexity of the components and the bizarre discharge pattern... this is the work of a team of specialists doing bleeding-edge work. It's amazing! A device like this, it's simply unheard of nowadays. Except," your engineer looks abashed suddenly, "Rumors. You know, people talk."
首席工程师清了清嗓子，随后 "我觉得，我可以让这个装置再度正常工作，但我得说我一点都不知道这个装置是怎么工作的。如果我们正常维修这艘船，它就可以正常工作。所以，我们要进行恢复吗？"

位于衰减轨道上的一次性导航信标将下方被辐射摧残的岩石行星识别为 "阿尔法研究站"。

对地表的扫描让你们发现了一处于陨石坑内崩塌四散的巨大研究设施。它原先的护盾阵列应该在不久前彻底失效，这导致整个建筑残骸都被强辐射清洗殆尽。换句话说，任何打捞行动都将无利可图。

不过，你也许可以派遣打捞小组在短时间内试着回收与这个设施有关的情报。看起来有人为了远离他人的窥探，在这个鸟不拉屎的环境里投入了大量资源，以建造这个研究设施来藏匿更有价值的东西。
options:
0:alphaSiteExplore1:派一支打捞小组下到设施中
100:defaultLeave:离开

text:
一枚位于衰减轨道上的小型卫星将下方被辐射摧残的岩石行星识别为 "阿尔法研究站"。你估计不久后它就会坠毁到星球上 —— 最多几个星历年。

你心血来潮，调出了第一次拜访这里的记录。

id:
# this is so frivolous... orbital satellite is gone after 2 years-ish
# love it.

text:
你的$shipOrFleet来到了被辐射摧残的岩石行星，即俗称的 "阿尔法研究站" 的轨道上。

原先用于识别这个天体的导航卫星已经不知所踪，操作了一番后，你眼前的屏幕上显示出了一个位于饱经辐射炙烤的风化平原上的亮斑，那便是卫星撞击地表时留下的浅坑。由于这颗星球没有大气层，撞击坑存续的时间将比那颗卫星的存续时间更久，会长达数百万年。

你心血来潮，调出了第一次拜访这里的记录。

在经过严密并且冗长的准备 (和反复重申对应的危险津贴政策) 之后，一组自愿参与的打捞小组乘坐加强辐射屏蔽的重装穿梭机出发了。

他们在设施的主要入口附近着陆，随后向指挥中心汇报这次入侵没有受到任何阻碍。在你旗舰的舰桥的投影屏幕上，一群重装打捞人员掠过被粒子云笼罩的防御炮塔；仅仅只是轻触，这些炮台就土崩瓦解。暴露在无情深空之下的任何物体都会从分子层面被侵蚀，瓦解，似乎所有的安全系统都被辐射所摧毁。

设施内部因为大门被摧毁已经失压。虽然设施的外壳具有一定的保护作用，但内部娇贵的计算机系统已经被辐射炸得酥脆。修复不太可能，没什么可以回收的数据。

为了加快搜索，小队成员在抗辐射药剂剩余的安全时间里原地解散，开始分头寻找遗迹中任何可能有用的物品。搜寻过程中，一位打捞队员进入了设施高阶成员的房间，并且发现了房间已故主人的那本纯天然材料制成的日记。

You examine the journal in the quarantine bay. The fine leather cover is discolored, but you can make out the embossed gold leaf Tri-Tachyon logo. Your salvage team has already scanned the text without opening the delicate pages of the book. The data has been placed in a secure cache for your review.

翻动着书本的扫描件，你仿佛进入了这个 速子 设施技术主管的私人世界。从最初对于在测试中被命令无视安全协议的含糊抱怨，以及对 Kelise Astraia 提出的要求的沮丧态度。以你对 速子科技 的了解，参与过失败项目的高管常常被当做替罪羊 —— 这显然是为避免记录被篡改而有意写下的备份。

高管本人对"能否走出这里"的担忧在显著地逐渐增加。表面情况下确实可以理解，但高管在书中的语气愈发地凸显出他日益增长而不曾消退的恐惧。

The remainder of the journal is difficult to read; most of the pages are torn or defaced, leaving a patchy, noisy scan in your display. Little of what's readable is coherent.

At the very end, there's one line, written in a clear, strong hand. "They sing to me. Everything will be alright."

虚拟成像在显示区域疯狂地扰动着，直到错误代码出现之前，数据库一直无法连接。你的通讯官在控制台前慌张的操作着。。

错误提示音变得柔软，恰到好处的嵌入到一股似曾相识的旋律之中，你也许见过它，但又完全没有印象。你没给自己留下做白日梦的时间，再度回过神来重新专注于自己的命令中。

As you approach the stark torus-hulls of Galatia Academy Station, your request to the automated docking queue is unexpectedly denied by a Hegemony-coded comm response. It's odd that the Hegemony Navy is controlling the docking procedures of this independent station.

Your primary bridge display shows an active view of a matrix of anti-ship batteries tracking your progress. Your tactical officer nods for your attention then activates a sub-display with a close-in view: a Valkyrie-class troop transport and its escorts are emplaced across the primary landing bay. They clearly don't want visitors.

You should report to Ancyra to find out what's going on.

接近 Galatia 学院空间站的纯白色圆环型外壳时，你向自动化停靠队列发送的停靠请求遭到拒绝。片刻之后，通讯链接意外打开，显示出 霸主 的标志。这是加密通讯，你的显示屏切换到一位使用手持通讯装置，看起来一脸不耐烦的 霸主 上尉。

"我很抱歉，舰长。学院在...呃...危机期间关闭。我不得不请你立即离开。"

一名副官出现在显示器里，在$hisOrHer耳边低语。

"所以你是我在 Ancyra 的指挥官找来的那位帮助我们的自由佣兵。"$HeOrShe的语气听上去轻松了一些，"我是 $personName 上尉。我们正在调查这些把 Galatia 星系搞得一团糟的家伙，而你帮我们解决外面的其他麻烦。祝你好运，舰长，万一你没有解决问题，那事情可就大条了。
options:
0:gaDuringTutorialMoreInfo1:"这是怎么回事？"
100:defaultLeave:表达感谢并挂断

text:
$HeOrShe在考虑是否回答你的问题。

"我想你在技术层面确实算是指挥系统中的辅助军。对，我们逮捕了学院的院长，指控他一系列罪名 —— 危及太空基础设施、忽视宜居性协议、密谋操纵未经授权的技术等等。"

"看在古老的地球的份上，"你注意到$hisOrHer的下巴不自觉地紧咬着，"这是他应得的。"

"我们听取了有关实验的简报，但它应该只会导致通信噪音的略微增加，可能是在跳跃点附近出现一些奇怪的读数。从未有过的！显然还有更多的事情正在发生，一些大到院长必须知道的事情，而且 —— "

上尉的副官再次在$hisOrHer耳边低语。如果你没弄错的话，背景中有一些喊叫声，中尉的手持式通讯装置几乎听不到。

"暴徒正变得焦躁不安，"上尉僵硬的笑着说。$HeOrShe向某人发出命令；当他们开始移动时，全息影像会因静电而紊乱和闪烁。"我们稍后再聊，舰长。如果你能帮我们摆脱困境，我会在 Coatl 空间站请你喝上一杯。"

当你接近 Galatia 学院空间站的纯白色圆环型外壳时，你向自动化停靠队列发送的停靠请求遭到拒绝。过了一会儿，通信链接接通并显示出了 $personName 上尉的影像，$HeOrShe看起来一副早该申请休假的样子。

"哦，舰长。你回来了？很抱歉，我们已经对学院实行了全面封锁 —— 严格的命令 —— 直到，呃，目前的危机得到解决。这意味着，没有人进入，也没有人离开。如果你和我的指挥系统有任何关系，你应该和我在 Ancyra 上的指挥官谈谈。"一名副官斜靠在镜头前，低声对$himOrHer说了些什么。

"我得走了。"上尉叹了口气。"悄悄跟你说，这些学院派？总是在问问题，而且喜欢唱反调，不听指挥。我希望你能尽快解决这个烂摊子。"

script: AddBarEvent coatlOfficer_barEvent "和上尉一起去喝一杯""你在酒吧里看到了你在 Galatia 认识的那位上尉，你记得他说过你要是来 Coatl 他要请你喝一杯。"

text:
你开始自我介绍，还没等你说完两个字，Tseen Ke 上尉就打断了你，" $playerName 舰长！当然，我怎么会忘记？这是一次多么伟大的行动啊"他假装恼怒地翻了个白眼 —— 和院士打交道，对吧？

他给你买了一品脱酒 —— 接着又来了一些 —— 以此来缓解那些不快的回忆。"你看，我们成功了，"他说，"Kallichore。那是他的名字，批准那项疯狂科学实验的学院老板，他差点害死了星系里的所有人，你敢信？"
options:
coatlOfficer_barEvent1:微笑点头
coatlOfficer_barEvent2:"你是对的。太不负责任了。"
coatlOfficer_barEvent3:"也许回报值得冒一些风险。"

text:
上尉沉默了片刻，他看着你。

然后他突然大笑起来，拍了拍你的背。"嘿，我喜欢你，$playerName。如果你哪天回到 Coatl 附近，可以来找我。海军经常会有外包工作，你永远不知道会接到什么。"

他忍不住打嗝，站起身说，"我该去值班了"然后跌跌撞撞地走向洗手间。

The lieutenant is silent for a moment, looking at you.

Then he bursts out laughing, and slaps your back. "Hey I like you, $playerName. If you ever find yourself back around Coatl, look me up. The navy contracts out some odd jobs; you never know what might come up."

He suppresses a belch and stands, "Duty calls," then stumbles toward the lavatories.
options: backToBar:Take a look around the bar

text:
Galatia 学院空间站的纯白色外壳缓慢地、壮观地旋转着掠过，象牙塔在你面前若隐若现。你加入入港队列的请求已批准。展示着 Galatia 学院的历史，以及学院在保证不受政治因素影响的同时向英仙座星域提供教育和科研方面所发挥的作用的自动视频欢快地弹出，然后被你的副官贴心地设为静音。

停机坪上满是普通的民用运输机，几艘高端的私人飞船，还有远处正卸下补给的一排货船。一名初级学院代理人在一个登陆休息室迎接你，手里还拿着宣传品。
"你好，舰长。也许你是校友？你考虑过向学院的奖学金信托基金捐款吗？"
代理人笑得很灿烂。"你有没有考虑过与学院一起设立奖学金？"

options: 2:gaInfoDump:询问与 Galatia 学院有关的事

text: 你连接到学院的通讯目录并浏览公共列表和其他已知列表。

The agent launches into a polished spiel, "The Academy was founded pre-collapse, a humble institution of research and higher education on the grand frontier of the Domain. The dual foci were practical matters in fields from applied terraforming to engineering sciences and more theoretical pursuits, including study of local astrophysics and xenobiology. The Collapse of course, changed everything, and in the following cycles... "

Your eyes wander over the people coming and going. Groups of energetic youth display earnest association with various subcultures by modifying their standard Academy uniforms- knockoff hivescum holo tags, ironic Luddic weave, Hegemony officer coats done up in off-code colors and patterns, ill-fitted spacer rigging. A few proper academicians in pale coats study their datapads or walk swiftly in small groups to meetings and lectures.

id: # bar event telling you to go check out the GA

script: AddBarEvent goToGA_barEvent "和院士对话" "几位看起来十分成功的舰船军官正倾听着一位穿着制服的著名院士讲话。" highlight

text:
当你走近时，$heOrShe回头看了看并说：" $playerName 舰长！不用那么惊讶，你的名声非常富有吸引力，可以说，你是整个行业的风云人物。"

$HeOrShe打发了其他军官，并承诺稍后加入他们，然后朝你示意，"真是外行。我的意思，和你相比起来。我相信你听说过学院的新院长？"
options:
goToGA_barEvent1a:"新的什么？"
goToGA_barEvent1b:"哦，Galatia 学院有新领导了？"

text:
"我很抱歉，"$heOrShe带着歉意尴尬地笑着说，"我们象牙塔中的学者在自己的世界里迷失了方向。一切都围绕着下一篇论文，下一次会议。"

这位资深院士挥了挥手，驳回了这一切。"新院长。在 Kallichore 院长的那次尴尬事件之后，学院迎来了新的领导 —— 一位大胆的领导。致新院长，Anahita Baird!"$HeOrShe举起了$hisOrHer的酒杯祝酒。这时你才意识到自己和他们一样，手里也拿着一杯什么东西。
options:
goToGA_barEvent2a:举杯
goToGA_barEvent2b:将酒杯放回吧台上

text:
"啊，我就知道你和看起来一样聪明，"$heOrShe朝你眨了眨眼

"是的，学院正在经历变革！在 Kallichore 院长的那次尴尬事件之后，学院迎来了新的领导 —— 一位大胆的领导。致新院长，Anahita Baird！"$HeOrShe举起了$hisOrHer的酒杯祝酒。这时你才意识到自己和他们一样，手里也拿着一杯什么东西。
options:
goToGA_barEvent2a:举杯
goToGA_barEvent2b:将酒杯放回吧台上

text: 你举起酒杯，这位资深院士热情地与你碰杯，然后一饮而尽。
你放下酒杯，向院士投以怀疑的目光。$HeOrShe耸了耸肩，在你没有配合的情况下喝下$hisOrHer自己的饮品。

"敬新血液，敌人们被屠杀，土地被征服，你说是不是？当然完全是比喻性的，不过要我说 霸主 的清洗清除了守旧派并创造了一些机会，这就要说到你了。"

一只手有点无礼地搭在了你的肩膀上。"新上任的院长委托过我寻找像你一样的人，而现在我找到了。来 Galatia 星系的 Galatia 学院，但你明显不需要我告诉你，哈哈，来和 Baird 院长见一面。"

$HeOrShe的表情严肃了一刻，"她有一个对未来的愿景，舰长。在现在这样的特殊时刻，她可能真的能实现这个愿景。听听她有什么说的。别抱有成见。

$HisOrHer的语气轻松了些，$HisOrHer瞥了眼刚刚之前一起狂欢的舰船军官们，"现在请容我先行告退，我相信我还欠我的新朋友们一轮酒。我会很快在Galatia学院见到你的，不是么？"

id: # Galatia Academy, first in-person meeting w/ Baird

text:
学院的接待人员用个人通讯器默默地提交了申请，然后耐心地看着你。"新上任的院长工作十分繁忙。毕竟新的管理层是经过上次...呃..上次那些的不愉快之后才刚换届的，还请您理解。您可能需要再等一段时间才能和院长见面。通常要等上几天，不过最长也不会超过几周。您不介意的话，可以将通讯 ID 留给我，到时我会..."

通讯设备发几声轻响，打断了这位接待的话。

"您好...呃，您确定吗？好的，明白了，我们现在就上去。"接待人员转过头来，"Baird 院长现在就会和您会面。请跟着我来，舰长。"

接待人员领着你穿过一扇不显眼的安全门，进入了一系列无需经过公共大厅的通道。接待人员激活了一部观景电梯，并点头示意你请从这边进去。

你走进吊舱，透过舱体四周的金刚石方窗向外望去。你看到了之前经过的山谷般的广场，那里学生、学者和技工络绎不绝。目光上移，吊舱距离悬在空间站内部弧线上方的分层结构越来越近了。随着吊舱逐渐减速，你活动了一下身体，来适应此处的重力梯度场。

你想，自己现在应该来到 Galatia 空间站的核心了。

A guard wearing a mirrored faceplate dismisses the junior agent and ushers you to an antechamber filled with small groups waiting to meet with the provost. They have perfect hair and perfect skin unmarred by the radiation and burns that mark a spacer. Those cybernetics you can spot are consciously stylish adornments rather than crude augments. Many have brought their young progeny with them. The stench of wealth and influence is palpable.

Heads turn as you are led past all of them toward a set of large doors inlaid with wood from what looks like real trees. You feel their glares on you like point defense fire on heavy armor.
options:
0:gaRequestMeeting3:不为所动，目视前方。
1:gaRequestMeeting3a:向他们微笑并眨眼，你很清楚自己是特殊嘉宾。

text:
You enter the office and the doors close silently behind you. Provost Anahita Baird turns to acknowledge your entrance while concluding a call via her desk tablet. 

Ancient wooden shelves for real, paper books gleam darkly in subdued light emanating tastefully from nowhere. The shelves are only half-stocked from crates scattered around the office. A brass orrery of the Galatia system adorns a plinth in the midst of a seating cluster. Parchments mounted behind the provost's desk display intimidating intellectual rankings, their seals of authenticity softly glowing.

"I apologize for the mess," she says, having noted your examination. "I've only just moved office."

Before you speak she raises a hand.

"You're not here to set up a donation. Why then? Because it is very much in my interest to know about the up-and-coming mercenary captain who is capable of reversing the unfortunate situation created by my ambitious but incautious predecessor."

A pause.

"This institution is not devoted to purely theoretical work," she forms a cradle with her hands, as if to hold an idea as she explains it, "For what use is knowledge if it does not give us the power, and wisdom, to change the world for the better?"

She leaves the question hanging in the air for a moment.
options:
0:gaRequestMeeting5a:"Knowledge is good for its own sake."
1:gaRequestMeeting5b:"Knowledge uplifts the human spirit."
2:gaRequestMeeting5c:"Knowledge can also be very profitable."
3:gaRequestMeeting5d:"Knowledge brings us closer to the Creator."
4:gaRequestMeetingSayNothing:Say nothing

text:
她抢在你说话之前举起一只手。

"你当然不是来捐款的。那是因为什么呢？因为我非常想了解那位纠正我野心过剩但谨慎不足的前任所造成的不幸局面，日渐崭露头角的雇佣兵舰长。"

她顿了一下。

"这个机构并不致力于纯粹的理论工作，"她用手模仿摇篮，像是托住自己的想法。"如果知识不能给我们用于改善世界的力量与智慧，那么知识有什么用？"

她把这个问题抛了出来。
options:
0:gaRequestMeeting5a: "知识因其本身而美好。"
1:gaRequestMeeting5b: "知识鼓舞了人类的精神世界。"
2:gaRequestMeeting5c: "知识能带来很大的利润。"
3:gaRequestMeeting5d: "知识使我们更接近创造者。"
4:gaRequestMeetingSayNothing:什么都不说

text: Baird 院长在你刚要说话时打断了你，"那只是个反问句，舰长。"

She brings her hands apart. "The Galatia Academy could make use of someone like you. Someone capable, discreet," and here she pauses, a tactic for emphasis she appears to employ often,  "And very well paid. I do not wish to make the same mistake as my predecessor. If one wants work done properly, appropriate incentive must be provided." 

She leans back and looks to you, done speaking. For real, this time. Probably.

options:
0:gaMeetingAccept: "我很感兴趣。你需要我做什么？"(接受)
1:gaMeetingDecline: "谢谢，但我有些需要优先处理的事项。"(拒绝)
2:gaMeetingScholarship:"Actually, I really did want to create a scholarship."
notes: # Yeah, uh, this is a bit silly. Maybe do it later. -dgb

text:
You manage to surprise Provost Baird. She is silent for several confused seconds, processing your statement.

"I see," she says finally, "Um. Talk to my assistant about that. He'll make the arrangements." The provost shakes her head once as if to clear the idea from her mind. 

"Now, where were we."

"你拿到的补贴，其实是 霸主 强加于我们的一个惩罚性措施，"院长平静地解释道，"如果他们直接扣押我们的资产，那就违反了他们不干涉 Galatia 学院政策的原则，那样的话，在旁人看来，他们的形象不比海盗好多少。"

"于是他们换了一种做法，让我的前任 Tomas Kallichore 在离职前签了一系列繁重的合约，把我们的资产以赏金的方式散遍整片星域。再后来他就被转移到了 霸主 的地牢里。

"Baird 狡黠地笑了笑，似乎很欣赏这手棋，"你能拿到赏金，也算是沾了霸主的光。"

script:
$entity.acceptedProvost = true
$player.metBaird = true
SetPersonHidden baird false
SetPersonHidden sebestyen false
BeginMission gaTTS
text:
"I shall put you in contact with Academician Alviss Sebestyen. He will be my liaison with you. You will receive a few mundane tasks from various departments in the Academy so that we may build a working rapport and provide you with the funds required to bring your fleet up to my standards." 

She looks over her spectacles at you, "Most of all I require evidence of trust. I intend to remain provost here for a long time, and productive relationships are built on trust."

"We will speak again before long, I'm sure." She looks out the dimmed windows at the great halls of the Galatia Academy. "You cannot imagine what we shall accomplish." 

She smiles now. Not for you, but for herself.

script:
$entity.declinedProvost = true
$player.metBaird = true
SetPersonHidden baird false
SetPersonHidden sebestyen false
BeginMission gaTTS
text:
"I see." 

The provost's tone seems to suggest that you've answered her question incorrectly. "There are other visionary space captains out there, I'm sure, who would be interested in extremely profitable work. Nonetheless, consider my offer carefully. Perhaps after some thought you will see just how reasonable it is."

She turns away, to her desk console, and activates some display which casts cool light over her face. "After you have time to properly consider my offer, contact my assistant, Academician Sebestyen. Someone will give you his comms ID."

She taps at her console. "Good day, captain."

text:
短暂的等待过后，你的通讯请求接到了自动应答上。

"您已连接至 Anahita Baird 院长的办公室。请联系您的行政联系人以取得预约队列号码。该通话将于三秒后结束。"

这机器还真是言出必行。

你的通讯立即被接通了。你看到一位助手，看起来不需要你自我介绍他就认出了你。"请稍等片刻 $PlayerSirOrMadam，院长很快就会来。"

又等了片刻，通讯被接通到了在办公室里的 Baird 院长。她花了些时间完成另一个全息屏上的工作，接着转向你。

"啊，$playerName。你这个时间点来找我是有什么事呢？"
你切断了通讯链接。

通讯立即被接通了。你看到一位初级助手，看起来不需要你自我介绍他就认出了你。"请稍等片刻 $PlayerSirOrMadam，"显示屏闪烁了一下变为显示着 Galatia 学院徽章的等待界面。

片刻后，那位助手再次出现，"我很抱歉，但是院长要求和您当面会谈，越快越好。"他在数据平板上按了两下，继续说道，"已经为您专门安排好了一个降落机位，$PlayerSirOrMadam。我们很快就能恭候您的光临。祝您愉快。"

就这样，你一句话还没说，通讯就暗了下去。

options: 1:gaBairdShuttle:乘坐穿梭机面见 Baird 院长

text:
You find a junior academy agent pacing in the landing bay reception lounge. As soon as you enter, they spot you with a look of relief and walk quickly to meet you.

"Captain $playerLastName! Thank you for coming. The provost will see you immediately. If you would just follow me this way, thank you..."

The junior agent leads you through a series of back hallways and secure lifts toward the administrative suite occupied by Provost Baird at the core of the station. 

You are led past diamond-matrix windows through which you can see vistas of the curving internal canyons of Galatia Academy Station. The light dims, and you approach the front waiting room of the office of the provost. It is filled with representatives of the most well-connected of the Persean Sector, whose eyes focus on an interloper like the beam array of a Paladin PD system.

The self-assured march of the junior agent seems to project the impression that you're performing some adjutant role - your presence is immediately ignored.

script:
BeginConversation baird false true
unset $global.bairdWantsToTalk
unset $global.asebSayBairdWantsToTalk
$market.gaTTB_completed = true 0
Call $global.gaTTB_ref updateStage
text:
"Ah, Captain $playerName." Provost Anahita Baird taps something away on her desk interface and turns to address you. "I am pleased that you've come to meet with me. And for all the work you've done for my project already."

She lowers her head just a degree, "You didn't think I'd be wasting your time with make-work, did you?" She considers this for a moment, "Well, there was some. Noise had to be introduced to the system to ensure that an outside observer would not immediately identify you as my agent."

"这也将我们带到了我想讨论的主题。请不要太拘谨。" 

Baird 看向一边的座椅，示意你坐下，这些座椅围绕着一张由某种大树的根部结构雕刻而成的桌子，看上去是卢德工匠手工雕刻的作品。

"他们的手艺很精妙，"她说，"即使他们的信仰是错置的。"

她十指交叉，谈回到正事上。"你已经证明你可以被信任。所以现在我希望你在我的大计划中发挥更积极的作用。"
options: bairdIntroC4:"那么，这个大计划是什么呢？"

text:
"Saving the Persean Sector." She is content to let the words hang in the air for a moment.

"I don't ask that you like me and I won't make a sanctimonious appeal to emotion. What I ask is that you recognize, rationally, that I am pursuing a course of action unburdened by factional demands. Indeed, this will be the foremost effort to ensure the survival of our civilization from utter collapse."

"We will not be saved by a retreat to homesteads on fragile balls of rock, nor by an arms race which throws precious resources into the fires of interfactional squabbling. We have to reach beyond the known, develop theories that shatter all that has come before, and apply radical new technologies to ensure our survival. We must reach further and higher than the Domain ever dared!" As she speaks, she raises her eyes up toward some abstraction. 

This, you think, is something she believes in.

options: 1:bairdIntro_whyMe:"足够了，那么为什么需要我呢？"

text:
"You have proven yourself to be... capable," she says.

"These people," she waves a hand to indicate the Galatia Academy, "are very good at very specific things over which they have obsessed all their lives. But they've kept themselves too long in the ivory tower. They're soft. The world is out there," her voice rises, "And we must change it."

She lowers her voice again, speaking directly to you, "And that is why I need you."

"I imagine your self-interest would provide sufficient motivation. As you well know, we pay in cash. The prospect of the continuity of technological civilization is an added benefit, is it not?"

"Unless," she pauses, then looks at you over her AR-spex, speaking evenly "I've gravely misjudged you, and your heart is set on liquidating your fleet, donating the proceeds to charity, and taking up with a flagellant order on Hesperus... no, I've got it- you've been doing a lot of reading; well, watching dark-channel holovids mostly- and have half a mind to enlist as a political enforcer smashing teeth in for the 1000-year reign of the 'Lion of Sindria'. Did I get it right?"

Your shields hold firm under the broadside of sarcasm deployed by the Provost.
"我想也是" 她往后靠了下去，将你的回答视为退让。

"Your tasks will not be so simple from here on out. I expect you to self-adapt to circumstances in pursuit of the objectives I lay out. And." 

She pauses for a moment, considering, before continuing in a tone colder than before, "No matter what you have to do, as long as you pursue the mission goal, I will see that you are rewarded. Securing the future is worth... everything."
options:
bairdIntro_what:"你有什么事需要做的？"
bairdIntro_morality:"我不愿意为了你的 '未来' 牺牲我所有的道德底线。"
bairdIntro_safeguard:"为了守住未来，我不惜一切代价。"
bairdIntro_whatIf:"那么如果我不想帮助你呢？"

text: "当然不了。" 她摆出一个并不完全友好的笑容。"我也不会要求你这样做。这正是我想给你这么多周旋余地的原因 —— 让你能用你的方法来办事。正确的方法。你已经证明了你方法的可行性；我不能否认放在我眼前的证据。"
"当然了。" 她微笑着，你几乎相信了。"这就是为什么我请你帮忙：你那将你个人情感放在一旁，客观看待事态的能力。你知道领导与成功需要什么。我见过。"

"Ah, the skeptic; of course. As an intellectual, I respect that you don't simply accept my demands due to my authority. I wouldn't have called you here if I wanted an obsequious minion to leap at my every request. I already have those." 

"To your question: you would miss out on the opportunity of your life."

She speaks almost casually, like it doesn't matter what you think. But there's an edge to her voice that suggests she does care, very much. "Whatever your feelings, first hear what I have to say and then consider - rationally - what is best. I am confident that you will discover that our interests align."

"So. Hear me out."

"My predecessor, Provost Tomas Kallichore, led a series of misguided hyperspace manipulation experiments. Ah, how to put it in layman's terms?"

Baird looks troubled to have to do this, sighs, then speaks: "Captain. Your ships fly through hyperspace with special engines. The Gate network of the Domain was similar, but also very different. Kallichore thought there might be a way to use starship hyperdrives to re-open the Gates."

"Obviously it went terribly wrong, and the Galatia system was cut off from hyperspace when the jump-points were disrupted beyond usability. Though we hear some yahoo found a way to cross unstable jump-points; an act well beyond irresponsible considering the chance of a cascading resonance event- ah, I apologize. That is irrelevant."

"What matters is that once the mess was finally cleared up, the Hegemony descended on the Galatia Academy with a technological inspection fleet. They tore the place apart, arrested the heads of the hyperphysics department and several labs, and of course took Provost Kallichore in for questioning." 

She turns away. "And, with little delay, sentencing." 

"He was a fool, and too trusting," Baird says with contempt. "We lost good people and good research. Scientific breakthroughs are built on the development of theory and, yes, even negative results."

"我需要你找回 Kallichore 的秘密档案。我们需要他那次实验的数据，包括其之前的准备性实验。霸主肯定留在手上。他们保存一切。作为证据，你懂的。"

"此外还需要 Scylla Coureuse 院士。她是一位超空间物理学研究员，跳跃点实验背后理论小组的基石。霸主 一直以来目光短浅，在第一次扫荡中只逮捕了项目负责人。他们不明白的是当时测试的基础理论主要是由一位...不适合领导的院士撰写的。"

"我需要你找到她。"
options:
bairdIntro_archive:"如何能从霸主手上拿到 Kallichore 的档案？"
bairdIntro_scylla:"你手上有 Scylla Coureuse 的线索么？"

script: AddTextSmall "Received comms ID for Rayan Arroyo" highlight
text:
"Galatia 实验之后。霸主 的科技审查员查封了所有的数据记录。最直接的方法是进入科技标准部的数据库。他们是你可能称之为'AI 稽查员'的人，并同时在其他职位服役。这可不是小事，"她看起来有些想笑，"但曾经也有人办到过。"

"我的确有个...老熟人，他在 速子科技 的行政梯队中上升很快。他的名字叫 Rayan Arroyo，在 Eochu Bres 办公。也许他能被说动在这一目标上动用某些人力资源协助我们。我会把联系信息转发给你。" 她在她的桌面终端上敲了一会儿。
"这么说吧，这事关乎他未来的职业生涯。报我的名字，如果你的态度足够强硬而谨慎，我相信你会发现他十分乐于助人。"
options:
bairdIntro_archive2b:"Rayan Arroyo，明白了。"
bairdIntro_archive2a:"你想让我去勒索一位速子科技的高管？"

text:
"不完全是。我，"她说这句话时加重了语气，"我只是单纯地注意到一位 速子科技 的高管为了在事业上超过竞争对手而损害了公司安全。"

"他明白这个交易的价值，何况比起其他选择，他已经算是赚的盆满钵满了。你会发现他相当愿意合作。"
"他为了压过竞争对手损害了公司的安全。他明白他与我达成的交易的价值。" 她几乎露出笑容，"一旦你克服了他膨胀的自尊心，你会发现他相当愿意配合。"

"As for the prodigy of Galatia..." Baird trails off.

Is that regret? The look quickly disappears.

"Coureuse 一直都是个怪胎。才华横溢，但她总是会分心于参与...嗯...制造对立的亚文化中。" Baird 挥了挥手，将其当作花边新闻。"或许 霸主 的镇压使她摆脱了那种幼稚的影响。"

"她的家人和比如某些朋友们，"你想了片刻 Baird 有没有这些关系亲近的人，" —— 都来自 Westerness 星系的 Filkenhild，你可以从那里开始找。"

script:
$bairdIntro_scylla = true 0
AddTextSmall "收到了 $gaFC_starName 的导航数据" highlight
text:
Baird thinks for a moment. "If you are observed looking for Coureuse, you may be contacted by others who are looking for her. That could be useful. You could cut a deal, get some leads."

"Alternatively, her department was operating experimental packages in the $gaFC_starName system. We have detected some ongoing telemetry that suggests these instruments are still in use, though it isn't clear by whom." She taps her desk interface, "I've sent you the coordinates."

The provost looks at you over her spectacles. "How do you want to handle this, captain? Are you a diplomat or an explorer? Do you want to find the probes in the $gaFC_starName system or talk your way through this on Fikenhild?"
options:
bairdIntro_scylla2choiceB:外交路线
bairdIntro_scylla2choiceA:探险路线

text:
Baird 点点头，"当然。你本质上是一个...一个冒险家，不是么。"

"如果你想换一个方法，你必须让我知道，这样我才能确保你有你所需要的所有信息。"

Baird 点点头，"我想也是。没有什么问题是你觉得没法用交流解决的，是吧。"

"如果你想换一个方法，你必须让我知道，这样我才能确保你有你所需要的所有信息。"
"当你真的找到 Scylla Coureuse 时，我预计她不会很配合。我已经向你提供了一份加密信息。这是一个，啊，我以个人名义对她发出的呼吁。它应该有些说服力。"
options:
bairdIntro_scylla4b:"我相信这会起到作用的。"
bairdIntro_scylla4a:"你确定我会帮你威逼利诱 Couresue 吗？"

text:
"You need not be so conspiratorial, captain," Baird admonishes, "Not everything is cloak and dagger, blackmail and bribes."

"Our wayward academician has avoided all contact with the Galatia Academy since the Hegemony arrested her colleagues. I appreciate the rational response to a campaign of scientific suppression, but now she is needed for the role she was always meant to play."

"确实，"Baird 说，仔细看着你。"她的惶恐不安是对之前情况的合理反应，Kallichore 被调查、逮捕、公开审判。但现在情况变了，如果我们要突破停滞不前的上限，就必须要找到她。"

Baird 转向窗户。"由我来呼吁，Scylla 会响应的，"她说道，就像宣告一般。

options: bairdIntro_scylla:你有关于 Scylla Coureuse 的任何线索么？
bairdIntro_archive:我该如何从 霸主 手上拿到 Kallichore 的档案？

text: "找到 Kallichore 的档案以及 Scylla Coureuse 本人。一旦你完成了这两项任务，项目就可以进入下一阶段。" Baird 微笑着说道："到时候事情就要刺激起来了。"
options:
bairdIntro_outro2:"就这些了？"
bairdIntro_project:"所以这项目到底是什么？"

text: Baird 笑了，但她的眼睛中却没一丝笑意。"你到时候会看到的。"

She turns to her desk display and starts inputting a command sequence, done with you for now.

"Good day, captain," she says without looking up, "You may check in with me via comms for additional analysis as the operation develops, though I expect you to use your initiative."

"Oh, and I've re-authorized Academician Sebestyen with mission assignment access for your file. Carrying out his little jobs might be a good cover for your real work, and allows us to funnel additional credits to you."

You feel the subtle movement of air as the doors open silently behind you. Mirror-masked guards flank a junior agent who waits to escort you back to your shuttle.

通讯官将你的个人终端连接到本地网络。你先启动了指挥台周围的音频抑制场，接着输入 Baird 院长提供给你的通信 ID。某个 速子科技 子部门的全息标识转了半圈，然后通讯接通了。

"这里是 Arroyo。你哪位？" Rayan Arroyo 打量着你，就像在检查遍布划痕的星舰一样。他似乎对你有些意见。

"谁给了你我的通讯 ID？"他质问道。
options:
gaKA_arroyoProblem:"我听说你可以帮我解决一个问题。"
gaKA_arroyoProvost:"Anahita Baird 院长。"

text:
你的通讯连接到了自动应答。速子科技 子公司的全息标识在你的显示屏上不停地旋转着。两次"感谢您的耐心"与半分钟后，你得出结论，你的通讯请求被忽略了。

看来 Arroyo 想当面讨论业务。

"解决问题。" 他的语气很不耐烦。

"我不解决问题，伙计。我付钱让别人为我解决问题。你有问题？去找船厂把你那氧气泄漏修一修吧。除非你账户后面有七八个零没地方用，否则我对你的问题不感兴趣。"

他的嗓门逐渐大了起来。在你看来，他很享受这种责骂他人的时间。

"浪费够我的时间了么？现在告诉我是谁让你来烦我的，我等下就要去解雇他。"

有那么一瞬间，你似乎看到 Arroyo 的脸上掠过一丝惊慌。取而代之的是傲慢的笑容。"哦，当然，当然 —— Galatia 学院的捐赠基金，我哪敢忘啊。"

"这里。"他敲了敲什么东西，你的通讯器显示了一组刚传入的坐标和一个降落信标的密码。

"乘坐穿梭机下来。我们可以就基金的问题进行接洽。我相信院长有着一些令人振奋的计划，我想好好了解一下 —— "他抬起眼睛看了看，又低下头来直视着你，"当面谈。"

He carries on as if this was all perfectly expected. "Ever been planetside? Doesn't count if it's just the arcologies. I'll give you a tour of my chalet. Spectacular views, you'll love it. See you soon."

He closes the connection before you can respond.

options: 3:gaKA_visitChalet:乘坐穿梭舱到 Arroyo 在地表的小屋

text:
你的穿梭机降入了 Eochu Bres 刚形成不久的大气层，在犹如城垛般的高耸云层间穿行。一阵雨雾喷洒在你的视窗上，又在眨眼间被降下时的热量和速度擦拭干净。

飞行路线很快就偏离了一般的进场通道，引发了一堆来自 速子科技 航空管制的小额扣费：基本空域通行费、优先航路附加费、服务费、客户满意度保险费、广告屏蔽费 - 你刷掉了通知，专注于风景上。

Leaving behind the Tri-Tach arcologies, diamonds growing atop the detritus of tiered slums. Over pipelines, a steel-blue bay, jagged fjords interrupted by ice-jams and landslides. Up and over a great crumbling escarpment like a black wave that fills the horizon; you cross a landscape of oddly-hued tundra spotted with thousands of milky-green lakes.

A new range of mountains rises on the horizon, torn in half by catastrophic workings of the terraformers, and beyond is a chaos of steep valleys populated by dwarf pine and thin white waterfalls. The nav system sounds a tone indicating imminent arrival, and you see Arroyo's private chalet: a small compound of radical geometric architecture surrounded by low outbuildings.

Your shuttle approaches an ellipsoid landing pad that appears to hang in the thin air over a gorge.

当你到达时，一名人类仆人和一个机器人仆人平和地迎接你的到来，接着他们带你步入宏大的深色几何风格客厅。黄金镶嵌在黑玛瑙的桌面上闪耀，抛光的花岗岩地板上铺着的宝石色调地毯些许偏斜，其上的花纹设计感十足。

从金刚石方窗往外望去，映入眼帘的景色确实如Arroyo承诺的一样壮观。

Rayan Arroyo is sitting at one of the bars. He acknowledges your entrance with a nod as the servants disappear. He taps his datapad with two fingers. You hear the soft signal loss ping from your datapad and your sidearm-hand twitches instinctively.

Arroyo acknowledges this with the rise of one perfectly groomed eyebrow. "Calm down. Just making sure no one's listening." He flips through a series of null readouts on a datapad and, satisfied, sets it aside.

"So Baird is calling in another installment. What will that be, Captain $playerName?"
options:
gaKA_arroyoBreakIn:"我需要进入科技标准部的数据库"
gaKA_arroyoTour:"不先聊些别的么？之前说好的参观呢？"

text:
"不，"他说道。他环顾了一下四周，"但这确实很不错，不是吗？"

"比起和你对话我宁愿做任何其他事，所以让我们抓紧。你清楚你现在的待遇是因为我们共同的那位 '朋友'，对吧？"
options: gaKA_arroyoBreakIn:"我需要进入科技标准部的数据库。"

text: As soon as you say it, a smile grows on Arroyo's face. He starts laughing, and takes his time as it builds and falls. He laughs like he's strapped to a madman's rocket, with no escape. So why not enjoy the ride?
options:
gaKA_arroyoAMoment:Give him a moment
gaKA_arroyoSerious:"I'm serious, Arroyo."
gaKA_arroyoLaugh:Laugh with him

text:
He slaps the onyx bar-top one last time and puts his head in his hands.

"Of course." He looks out on the vista of saw-tooth mountains for a moment, then speaks with unusual passivity: "I'd just hate to start a third AI war."

As you start laughing, it seems to sap something from Arroyo's mania. You trail it off, leaving an awkward silence.

He puts his head in his hands.
He slaps the onyx bar-top one last time and puts his head in his hands.

He sighs and pours something from a crystal decanter into a glass, empties it. "To a deal that gets worse all the time!" 

Then pours another. He considers a moment, notices you, and tilts the decanter to offer you a drink.
他耸耸肩，抿了一口他的第二杯酒。"继续跟着 Baird。你也会找到能麻醉自己的恶习，"他说。
Arroyo 又倒了一杯，把平底杯递给你，狠狠碰了一下。"也敬 Anahita Baird！"他喊道。

script:
SetTextHighlights Gargoyle
AddTextSmall "Received comms ID for Gargoyle" highlight
FireAll GAKAArroyoHub1
text:
他猛地放下空杯子。"我知道一个人能办到。他是个麻烦人物，但关键是足够疯狂，会接你在提议的这活。一个叫 Gargoyle 的黑客 —— 真正的黑客，不是那些模仿者。我们以前打过交道。这是他的通信 ID。" Rayan 从口袋里掏出一个数据钥，在他的数据平板上挥了一挥，点了几下后把它推向你。

"如果你们有什么小矛盾，如果 Gargoyle 耍脾气，就照样子跟他对着干。他就喜欢小题大作，但反正你已经接手这么蠢的差事了。" 他举起一只手，"顺便说一下，你真的没必要告诉我那些细节。我最不想看到的就是 霸主 情报人员在我的地盘上转来转去。或者更糟，让董事会的一些吸血鬼摸到端倪。"

options: gaKA_arroyoGargoyle:"能不能跟我多聊一聊这位 'Gargoyle'？"
gaKA_arroyoBairdWhat:"所以 Baird 到底有你什么把柄？"

text:
他给你了个眼色。"不可以，谁在乎呢。这不重要，你所听到的关于 Gargoyle 的事情真假参半，所以别白费时间了。"

他向后靠了靠，目光看向别处，满足于自言自语。"重要的是，Gargoyle 总是能完成工作，我觉得他真是个强迫症。"他用手在头上转了转，示意。"搞不好还插错了什么赛博植入体的那种，脑子里多了个 AI，少了块额叶。"

"祝你们相处愉快，"他嬉皮笑脸地说。

"Baird 做了一笔很划算的投资，而她等的时间越长 —— "他向周围奢华的环境挥了挥手，这些都是 Rayan Arroyo 的事业" —— 收到的利息就更多。"

他耸了耸肩。"对我来说，这已经够好了。我们做出交易终归是为了出人头地，于是我还见过更坏的事，当然也做过还要更糟的。外加，我现在可是一份资产。你不能就这么扼杀由更大的把手拥有的资产。"

他转过身来，死死盯着你。"而你现在也是一份资产了。想想这个问题 —— 她有你什么把柄？" 他露出了冷笑，"我希望你能想通。"

你已经从Rayan Arroyo那里得到了你需要的东西，你没看到他有发出什么信号，但他的人类与机器人仆人再次出现。

"我不会说这次的见面很愉快，但如果你哪天有太多钱不知道怎么花，或者说，一个十分卓越的商业契机，让我们交换一下通讯密钥，这样你下次要找我就不用定位我地毯上的太空尘埃了。"

他在他的数据平板上敲了敲后递给了你，而你也走了一下无聊的流程，至少这会让想要骇入你们共同通讯的人多费些功夫。

script:
EndConversation DO_NOT_FIRE
ShowDefaultVisual
$global.gaKA_talkToGargoyle = true
Call $global.gaKA_ref updateStage
text:
你的穿梭机原路返回，飞下高地，穿过湖泊高原。你看到几个爬行式移动工厂把管道和单轨铁路的塔架倾泻在地面上，留下一条条新翻开的红土痕迹。

穿过乱岩和一小片寒冷的海域，越过点缀在山地贫民窟之上的闪耀高塔。在 速子科技 腹地的上空，导航通讯协议和通讯噪音逐渐成为一阵轰鸣，穿梭机把你送回了轨道上。

After connecting to the local network, you enter the comms ID for Gargoyle then pause at the prompt to initiate the call. You look over to your comms officer and they nod, ready to act.

As soon as you execute the command, the electronic warfare console lights up like fleet action in a nebula. Comms wrangles the infosec systems with cool efficiency, coordinating active response with nav, sensors, and engineering stations. 

After perhaps half a minute the storm breaks, the alarms quiet, and your primary display resolves from a mesmerizing fractal battleground to a heavily augmented face grinning impishly.

"You were ready for me!" Gargoyle says too sweetly to be true before turning to an imagined audience, "The rocket jockey put together enough brains to deal with my little 'hello'!" Gargoyle bounces back and applauds, "Well done!"

"So you know who I am. Tell me, why did Rayan give you my comms ID? More presents, bribes, begging? Did he finally get in trouble with that junta of puppeteering vampires he desperately wishes were his friends? ...On the run from the law and needs a rep wipe?"

A thoughtful pause. "Do you always make that face when you meet new people?"
options: gaKA_gargoyleCont2:"有份工作给你，我听说你是最棒的。"

text:
"A job? Uh, no," Gargoyle gags theatrically. "If I ever do a day of 'work' I want you to throw me out the airlock, then throw that airlock into a black hole."

The hacker lounges back carelessly, "But... still listening. Because you told me I'm the best, and I am. That was nice. But I'm not sure you really understand what it is I do." 

A hand studded with interface nodules waves and your display fills with news clips - industrial shutdowns, suspected sabotage, databases hacked, political comms leaked, credits missing, ghost fleets.

"我做的，" Gargoyle 又一次坐直了，并且终于严肃了气来，"是施展魔法。"

"机构、政体、战舰、舰队、霸主！卢德教会！还有那超他妈有钱的 速子科技！这些都是由人组成的机器，而这些人不了解他们自己组成的机器。"他换上了一种嘲弄的语气，"其他人也一样，细想一下。这些神圣的大集合体只不过是场巨大的骗局！"

"但我，" Gargoyle 敲了敲头戴式的数据端口，"我能理解。简单地说，"屏幕上伸出了一根戳着你的手指，"戳戳这里，然后是这，最后是那里，这一切就会化为泡影。让事情在错误的时间朝正确的方向发展，强者就会变成一个悲哀的笑话。化作一阵风、一个花哨的屁，或者一个破碎的薄壳。明白了吗？"
options:
gaKA_gargoyleYes:"嗯，我也这么认为。"
gaKA_gargoyleNotReally:"没有听懂。"
gaKA_gargoyleCanYou:"你能黑进 霸主 部门的数据库吗？"

text:
Gargoyle 目瞪口呆地盯着你。"不你根本没听明白，你只是在装模作样，因为你觉得你不能在你的手下面前丢了面子。"

Gargoyle 转过身去："我为什么要自找麻烦？开你的飞船去吧，$playerFirstName 舰长。噼啪嘣！接招吧，太空海盗！简单，直接，朴实，毫无艺术感。"

他夸张地叹了口气，"真是浪费时间。我们为什么要聊这个，还聊了这么久？"
options: gaKA_gargoyleCanYou:"你能黑进 霸主 部门的数据库吗？"

text: Gargoyle 双手托着下巴，绝望地凝视着你。"我浪费了好多时间在你身上，$playerFirstName。我在努力，真的。给我点事做。好吗？否则我可能会把自己冻上那么一千年。也许那之后会发生点趣事。"
options: gaKA_gargoyleCanYou:"你能黑进霸主部门的数据库吗？"

text: "太棒了！" Gargoyle 大叫着坐了起来，"真是个辉煌的计划，简直是霓虹灯般的黑！哪一个部门？还是所有部门一起？"他的显示面罩和赛博植入体开始活力四射地闪烁起来。
options: gaKA_gargoyleExplain:"别激动 —— 事实上，就一个。"(解释任务)

text:
You explain to Gargoyle the scope of the mission, and the target - the Kallichore Archive, the personal data store of former Provost Tomas Kallichore which the Hegemony Ministry of Technology Standards seized from the Galatia Academy in the wake of some kind of botched hyperspace experiment. 

You also explain, in terms which avoid any implication of an employer-employee hierarchy, that Rayan Arroyo will be providing funding for the operation.
在你说话的时候，显示着 Gargoyle 的通讯界面充满了写了一半的什么清单，参考面板和代码片段。黑客在一个又一个的鬼主意间跳跃着，权衡着各种各样的可能事件，他总是能领先你的话几步 —— 但也会走偏。视觉上的混乱有点让人分心。
options:
gaKA_gargoyleCont5:"你需要点时间来理清思路？"
gaKA_gargoyleCont5a:"这任务有完成的可能性吗？"

text:
"It might be tough. I'm going to need to pass some credits along to a couple friends for some special tricks. Hmm. Do we go all out? Rayan is buying snacks... I think we do. Yes."

"Here's how it's gonna happen- I've got a friend who will make you a little package. It should be ready by the time you get to Nova Maxios. In the Magec system, know it? You pick that up, then do fancy flying and whatever else it takes to install it in the Hegemony comms relay in the Aztlan system."

A thoughtful pause, then, "For the relay? Go in quiet to do the relay. Park your fleet. Maybe run a lone phase ship for the job, if your ego is capable of surviving away from your big boy toys for a few shifts. Or - this is fun - hack the sensor array and give the Heggies some ghosts to chase."

"Anyway, the installation itself is easy," the hacker continues nonchalantly. "Any work-drone you've got on staff should be able to figure out which end goes where."

"然后就进入重点啦：破解 霸主 的加密系统。我打算把几年前就掌握的一个小漏洞留拿出来用，真是便宜你了。" Gargoyle 早早地展示了胜利的气势，然后坐了回去，"多么辉煌！"

"啊，继续。所以，在通讯中继上安装了黑客装置后回来这里，之后我给你一份解密数据的副本时你就可以亲自感谢我了。Rayan 老伙计有我的愿望单。"黑客按了一下按钮，"现在 —— "

script: AddTextSmall "Received location data for Nova Maxios pick-up" highlight
text:
黑客又按下了一个按钮，新 Maxios 主轨道环附近一个小型存储设施的地址和一个特定存储单元的号码被发到了你的数据平板上。"它来咯。" Gargoyle 笑着说，似乎在暗示这不是在开玩笑。

"在这一切准备好之前，我还有很多事情要做，所以去吧！当我们完成任务时，COMSEC 会大发雷霆的，哈哈！"

Gargoyle 看向了另一个显示器，接着通讯线路断开了，网络增强器开始以越来越快的速度闪烁起来。

options: 3:gaKA_visitStorage:乘坐穿梭机前往 Gargoyle 的存储单元

text: 你乘坐穿梭机进入了太空港的主港区，领者一堆保镖和技术人员踏上了空间站。接待室的天花板很低，老式的荧光灯管在不停地闪烁。新 Maxios 人似乎对他们这种东西凑合着够用就好的原则挺自豪的，一些本地人在注意到你的船员忍不住地把目光往一个漏得滴滴答答的维生管道上瞟的时候，微笑着互相推搡起来。

The address given to you by Gargoyle leads you to a run-down logistics ring that looks to be used mostly by failing tramp freighters and smugglers. You ask a young desk clerk where to find the unit number Gargoyle provided.

"Um, oh yes, you must be Captain... R. Boring?" the clerk squints at the desk terminal nervously - you log away this little joke from Gargoyle as you maintain impeccable composure - "I was told you'd be arriving for your cargo just a few minutes ago. Please, come right this way."

接待员领着你穿过后门 —— 一扇浅色的隔板门 —— 然后他僵住了：一个穿着单调的灰色制服的苍白男人就站在门后，如同黑暗中的一个灰点。

" Loke 先生，"接待员结结巴巴地说，"我没想到，呃，如果有人告诉我 —— "

那个人 —— 你猜他就是 Loke 先生 —— 温和地微笑着："我来给舰长带路。"

Loke 没有再理会接待员，而把注意力转移到了你身上，依旧面带微笑。他冲你点了点头，转身走进了门后的黑暗中。

Mister Loke leads you past rows of sealed storage units, into a loading bay. Your footsteps produce a dull metallic echo. Something that smells of organic compounds is leaking.

Still smiling blandly, Loke stops and with the wave of his hand unlocks a storage unit. He speaks softly to you, "When she heard of this, Jorien told me she thought it was very funny. She wanted me to come and make sure you got what the Gargoyle asked Elissa to make for you.

His watery eyes stare at the storage unit, "It must be a nice thing."
options:
gaKA_visitStorage3:"这些人都是谁？"
gaKA_visitStorage3a:"多谢了...我想我该这么说。"

text:
他没有回答，而是恭敬地点头，说了声 "再见"，然后走进了仓库的阴影里。

你摇了摇头，把注意力转向存储单元，里面只有一个标准货箱。你示意技术人员上前，于是他们提着各种扫描仪凑了过去；你可不想成为 Gargoyle 的又一个 "笑话"。

首席技术专家开始汇报："能量源，异常的中微子。还有，嗯，轻微的超波相位失真？"

技术专家组不约而同地后退了一步，毕竟超波相位技术声名狼藉，而且从没人知道它能在这么小的空间里保持稳定。

一个小时后，当你在附近的一家咖啡馆喝完第二杯热饮时，数据平板上传来了技术专家告知安全的消息，上边还附着结论，尽管这个设备很奇怪 —— 似乎是某种手工制作的一次性超波发射器 —— 它应该不会立即构成危险。

你下令把它搬到你的旗舰上。

搭乘返回$shipOrFleet的穿梭机时，你思考着将这个设备安装到 Aztlan 超波中继站上而不被 霸主 巡逻队发现的方法。一小支快速舰队，或者利用相位船的相位场降低被侦测范围。运气好的话，也可以碰到巡逻队轮班的时刻...

对讲器噼里啪啦地响了起来："舰长，我们到了。"
你的$shipOrFleet刚刚被一支附近的舰队探测到 —— 亦或是正在被其追逐，这使得秘密安装黑客装置不可能实现。
你的$shipOrFleet接近了 $name。
options:
daKA_installHack:在 Aztlan 的中继站上安装 Gargoyle 的黑客装置
defaultLeave:离开

text:
你向行动长官下达了命令，他则低声叮嘱了精心挑选的资深打捞技师一些注意事项，接着后者搭乘着货运无人机到达了中继站。

整个行动都按照事先规划好的迅速进行完毕。技师用有着低电磁信号的工具进行了几次快速切割，移除了部分舱壁，将 Gargoyle 的装置固定到位。安装在底盘上寄生微型无人机则完成了联接的关键部分 —— 主要是接入光纤线路。最后，舱壁被密封完成，队员们随着货运无人机的冷气体推进器启动开始了撤退，就如他们来时一样安静。

很快，通讯官收到了一个短脉冲信号，这证明 Gargoyle 的装置已经开始正常运作。

哪怕是不将 Gargoyle 那漫不经心的态度纳入考量范围，通讯官和技术专家依然推测这样的入侵很快会被发现。趁你还没被抓个现行，马上逃走会是个正确的选择。

你在想，霸主 会不会利用黑客装置反向追踪到 Gargoyle 的藏身处。速子科技 不太可能迅速回应 霸主 的调查申请，只是这不意味着调查行动不会以 "非官方" 的形式进行 —— 或许那种机密行动也不能用"调查"来形容了。

你应该尽快从 Gargoyle 那里取得档案。

你输入 Gargoyle 的通讯 ID，向通讯技师点头示意让对方准备好应对 Gargoyle 可能会为了找乐子从通讯器传过来的什么小惊喜之类的东西。

但这次没遇到什么鬼把戏。显示器伤立马解析出了一张熟悉的脸，挂着一种陌生的表情：恐惧。

"舰长，你得用你的船带上我离开这里。他们知道我在哪儿了。这次我居然真的干成了，太不可思议了。" Gargoyle 紧张地笑了，"这可是第二次 AI 战争以来最伟大的数据大劫案！"

黑客似乎已经意识到了情况的严重性："我想—— 他们这次有些，非常，超级，彻底的不高兴了。这可不安全。带我去... Galatia 学院？Anahita 有能耐把我藏起来，对吧？看在我做了这么多的份上，她应该会。"

options: gaKA_gargoyleDoYouHave:"你拿到 Kallichore 档案了？"
gaKA_gargoyleWhatIf:"如果我就这么把你扔下呢？"
gaKA_gargoyleOrderShuttle:派出一艘穿梭机去接 Gargoyle

text:
"就只有 —— 我 —— 和所有人！"

"让我数一下自己都交了哪些新朋友，" Gargoyle 开始扳起手指数了起来，"先从 霸主 开始，COMSEC 想着能派来所有人都算进去。我估摸着要是来一次正式的抓捕行动的话，肯定会闹成一场外交纠纷。所以可能会偷偷派些喜欢在暗地里拿枪崩人的喽啰试着来弄死我。接着是 速子科技，至少 霸主 整出什么大动静之后，他们也会派人来看看。别忘了还有那群 左径分子。霸主 情报网对于卢德佬们来说简直漏得像个筛子似的，他们又肯定爱死这种破事了。"

"让我给你总结一下把，我的好好舰长：不出...嗯...两三天这样，某件让各大势力紧张到临界点的大事就会把这个地方变成交火前线。到时候在港区里随便两个买拉杂面的太空佬，都可能有个是刺客或间谍什么的。"

"没时间了！但是 —— " Gargoyle 得意地笑着说，"我知道你想干什么。别担心，我把它锁得很好，用我的小技巧加密还备份了。如果你能找到它，哪怕是用 Alpha 级核心来破解它也要花费不少时间，更何况你还不知道它在哪。"

"如果我们把你们正在密谋的一切都透露给坏蛋 霸主，Anahita 教授就不会有什么时间了。所以，来接我的穿梭机呢？"

Gargoyle 的声音变冷了："那样你就得不到你想要的档案了，$playerName 舰长。因为我把它锁得很好，还做了备份。顺便说一句，我掌握了包括 Rayan Arroyo 以及你老板 Anahita Baird 在内各种人的情报！你当然也有份，舰长。当至高霸主在全星域新闻频道上看到你让我黑掉他们宝贵的技术部门时，他会大发雷霆的。"

黑客的笑容中没有一丝温度，"要么带上我，要么你会失去一切，舰长。"

Gargoyle 点了点头，"那样就好，舰长。我来收收我的小东西。"

你的穿梭机并没有收到交通管制员的质询；看起来他们还不知道发生了什么，大概吧。

你下令将 Gargoyle 关到离舰桥很远的地方，并嘱咐你的通讯技师留意别放过任何可疑的动静。

"舰长，"你的战术副官提醒你留意，"霸主 舰队来了。"

该溜了。

id: # Conversation with patrol that intercepts you after you leave Magec

text:
通讯器噼啪作响地亮起，霸主 $rank 出现在了显示屏上，双眼直直地盯着你。"独立舰队的舰长！我命令你关闭护盾、武器和超空间引擎。你涉嫌窝藏一名罪犯以及破坏 霸主 数据安全。"

$HisOrHer的嘴唇傲慢地卷了起来："霸主 陆战队即将登船，你的数据库将被查封，货物也将被扣押检查。你将会失去你对$shipOrFleet的控制权。犹豫以及不服从将被认为是抗命。现在，立刻交出你的命令代码。"

script: SetStoryOption gaKA_patrolLie general "说服 霸主 巡逻队你没有参与到对科技标准部的黑客攻击中"
text:
听到这些无异于星际海盗的蛮横命令后，你眨了眨眼。即使是 霸主 根据旧时代的人之领海军法典制定的法律，也会在这种情况下为你保留一些权力。你猜这个 $rank 过分鲁莽了，以至于在解释$hisOrHer的命令时没按规矩来。

当作出思考时，你注意到霸主 $rank 的脸变成了更深的红色，对方也许把你的沉默理解成了 "抵抗"。事已至此，不战而退可能很难。
options:
gaKA_patrolWarrant:"这些可是例外的搜查条款，你有搜查令吗？"
gaKA_patrolRefuse:"我可不接受那些条款，$rank。"
gaKA_patrolLie:用弥天大谎来蒙混过关
gaKA_patrolCut:你可没时间和对面耗，切断通讯
gaKA_patrolWeapons:将武器准备就绪

script: SetStoryOption gaKA_patrolLie general "说服 霸主 巡逻队你没有参与到对技术部的黑客攻击中"
text:
霸主 $ranks 瞪大了眼睛。"你没有资格提出要求，舰长。"$heOrShe几乎要抑制不住自己的愤怒，"你必须关闭所有系统，接受查封和检查，以及逮捕。"

$heOrShe眯起了眼睛："现在投降我可能会考虑宽大处理 —— 如果你这个叛徒的话里没有丝毫不服从的迹象。"
options:
gaKA_patrolRefuse2:"你必须有合法的搜查令。"
gaKA_patrolLie:用弥天大谎来蒙混过关
gaKA_patrolCut:没时间和对面耗，切断通讯
gaKA_patrolWeapons:将武器准备就绪

script: SetStoryOption gaKA_patrolLie general "说服 霸主 巡逻队你没有参与到对科技标准部的黑客攻击中"
text:
霸主 $ranks 瞪大了眼睛。"这不是一场谈判，舰长。"$heOrShe几乎要抑制不住自己的愤怒。"你必须关闭所有系统，接受查封以及逮捕。"

$heOrShe眯起了眼睛："现在投降我可能会考虑宽大处理 —— 假如你这个叛徒的话里没有丝毫不服从的迹象。"
options:
gaKA_patrolRefuse2:"你必须有合法的搜查令。"
gaKA_patrolLie:用弥天大谎来蒙混过关
gaKA_patrolCut:你可没时间和对面耗，切断通讯
gaKA_patrolWeapons:将武器准备就绪

script:
EndConversation
MakeOtherFleetLowRepImpact gaKA true
MakeOtherFleetGoAway false
MakeOtherFleetImportant gaKA false
text:
在你切断通讯的前一刻，霸主 $ranks 的眼睛瞪大了。接着画面变黑，$hisOrHer的咆哮随着画面的变黑变成了一片死寂。

" $PlayerSirOrMadam，"战术副官报告，"他们正在展开攻击阵型。"

你想，这已经严重违反了星域中的商贸法规，因此，相较于损害自己法理上的正统地位，霸主 更有可能掩盖接下来发生的任何 "事件"。

script:
EndConversation
MakeOtherFleetLowRepImpact gaKA true
MakeOtherFleetGoAway false
MakeOtherFleetImportant gaKA false
text:
霸主 $rank 点了点头，带着冰冷的仇恨说："你终于暴露了自己作为反动分子和恐怖分子的身份，我从一开始就知道。"

在尖锐的爆鸣声中，通讯中断了。

" $PlayerSirOrMadam，"你的战术副官报告，"他们正在展开攻击阵型。"

你想，这已经严重违反了星域内的商贸法规，因此，相较于损害自己法理上的正统地位，霸主 更有可能掩盖接下来发生的任何 "事件"。

你潇洒地行了一礼。

"$SirOrMadam，我得说这是一场误会。我正指挥一支特遣辅助军追捕一名渗透进来的恐怖分子。根据 HERMES BLACK 命令，在行动的过程中我不被允许接入 霸主 的通讯网络。我上司提供的任务条件也允许我独立行动。"

"$SirOrMadam。"你如此补充道，像是在说一件理所应当的事情。

当你自信地说出听起来合情合理的 霸主 行话时，$HeOrShe看起来一脸狐疑。霸主 $rank 盯着你问道："舰长，你为谁服务？你的上司是谁？"

没时间犹豫了。
options: gaKA_patrolLie3:"Admiral Orcus Rao, Ragnar fleet command."

text:
The Hegemony $rank's face doesn't change. Time for the cherry on top.

"He activated my fleet as a military auxiliary under the Chicomoztoc protocols," you explain. "I had to leave a whole cargo of transplutonics on the docks at Raesvelg."

"$SirOrMadam," you add again.

这似乎有效果了，你注意到 $rank 的态度在不知不觉中软化了下来。

"Rao 上将总是会做出一些突破底线的事，不是吗？这很不正常，舰长，我会向上级汇报的，现在，"$heOrShe抬了抬下巴，"专业人士将接管这场追捕，发送你观察到的任务目标最后的通讯信息和行动路线。"

你带着适当的失望情绪悄悄命令导航技师和通讯官弄出一些可信的东西来，他们即兴发挥的速度令人钦佩。你看着 $Rank，注意到 $personLastName 瞥了一眼自己的控制台后露出了满意的表情。

script:
MakeOtherFleetHostile gaKA false
MakeOtherFleetGoAway true
MakeOtherFleetImportant gaKA false
EndConversation
text:
"的确，"$HeOrShe说，"回去向 Rao 上将报告，建议他不要聪明反被聪明误，把常规行动搞得乱七八糟。"

$HeOrShe连个招呼也不打就唐突切断了通讯，你觉得有被冒犯到。

接着你回忆了一下过去，觉得当初那个在港口酒吧中度过闲得无聊的夜晚时，把一些注意力投入到 霸主 纪录片上的你十分机智。

id: # Returned to the Academy with Gargoyle and archive

text:
你的$shipOrFleet在排队进入空间站时被打断了；在这种情况下通常会有交通管制通讯，可这一次，取而代之地，你收到了院长办公室的直接通讯。

"舰长，"通讯官报告说，"她想和你说话。"

Anahita Baird 院长的形象出现了。"舰长，把你的 '特别货物' 用穿梭机直接带到这个码头。"她说，与此同时收到导航指示和对接代码的提示音响了起来，"我会等着你的。"

通讯链接被切断了。

推进器冷却时发出了咔咔声，你走下穿梭机，身后跟着 Gargoyle。在短暂的穿梭机旅程中，黑客接二连三的提问、建议以及对任何控制面板或触手可及的小玩意动手动脚的行为让你忍无可忍。

就和之前说好的一样，Baird 院长带着一小队头戴面罩的警卫和高级顾问在等着你。

"所以这便是 Gargoyle 了，"她说。

"Anahita，我们终于见面了！" Gargoyle 隆重地鞠了个躬。"我很荣幸接受您的邀请来 Galatia 学院任教，"然后他站直了，面带微笑，环顾四周。"我该开些什么课程呢？顶级派对教程，舞台剧式安保指南，也许再来门课叫做个人见闻录——那些导致了第三次 AI 战争的风流韵事？"

Baird 不带情绪地笑了笑，然后示意她们那一撮人中的一位上前。

"Gargoyle，来见见 Alviss Sebestyen 院士，" Baird 用一种放在 霸主 战舰舰桥上也没有违和感的语气说。"现在，Alviss，请慷慨地带 Gargoyle 去我们准备好的客房。"

她看向了你，显然相信 Sebestyen 能处理好局面。

"舰长，我们的客人让事情变得复杂了一些，但是..."她转身看向离开接待室的两人，Gargoyle 表面上配合着 Sebestyen 结结巴巴的建议，实际上似乎一心想着让这位院士手忙脚乱。

"看来，除了 Kallichore 的档案之外，我还获得了另一项宝贵资产。当然是由于您的主动，舰长，我是不会忘记这一点的，但是 —— "她环视了一下周围，挥挥手让警卫和顾问们离开了。

Baird 指了指旁边的运输舱："让我们去一个更适合讨论接下来的事的地方吧。"
Baird 通过舱窗看着外边的各种管道和远方的风景，陷入了沉思。安静的氛围开始支配这个空间，你发现这可能是一个向院长提问而不必打断她的滔滔不绝的机会。

options: gaKA_returnWhatWillHegDo:"如果 霸主 发现你收留了这个黑客，你该怎么办？"
gaKA_returnThinkOfGargoyle:"你觉得 Gargoyle 是个怎样的人？"

text:
Baird looks at you. "They suspect me already, of course."

"The Galatia Academy will appeal the original data seizure and demand the return of basic scientific research material- which is not illegal under even old Domain law. 'This data breach only proves the danger of restricting basic research as this situation enables unsavory parties to exploit discoveries without oversight from the ecumenica'."

"I appreciate the irony of my objection, of course. But this is war by public relations: there is no room for scruples. I'll be exactly as cynical as they already believe me to be, and they'll believe the act because it is true." As Baird speaks, you find a note of satisfaction in her description of plot and counter-plot. "Behind that truth of course," she continues, "Is what really happened. Which shall be a fait accompli once they discover it, and one too embarrassing to publicize."

Baird 看了看你，扬了扬眉毛，然后又别过了头。

"特别迷人，"她面无表情地说。"我已经任教二十年了，舰长。我见过更差劲的人。"

在一片寂静中，你几乎可以听到 Baird 脑子转动的声音。

运输舱在刹车的杂音中停下了，你能感觉到重力场发生的微妙变化。走下运输舱后，你注意到这似乎是后门，让 Baird 不用经过已经被满是 不习惯被告知他们需要等待的重要人物 所填满的等候室。

You follow Provost Baird into her office, and the doors close with a notable absence of sound. She motions you to a seat in front of her desk as she unlocks the interface.

"Captain, allow me to properly compensate you for your good work." She taps a command and your personal datapad pings in response. "I trust this will help cover certain of your expenses."

Your personal datapad pings; incoming funds transfer.

Now Baird's interface pings; an incoming signal. "Ah, good," Baird says, and slides a datapad over for your inspection.

It is a detailed progress report on Gargoyle's activities, including time-tables for decrypting the Kallichore Archive.

"Sebestyen is more capable than he appears. He is both persistent and meticulous, as you can see."

She motions at the datapad, "We should have the Archive decrypted in about a week. The value of this research data is enormous, of course, but we still require the means to put theory to practice. And that means is Coureuse. "

"Hers is not a unique genius, mind you," Baird says, with an almost uncharacteristic lack of certainty. "We could find other candidates to lead the research team, but the study and training... no, my timescale is too short. We need Scylla Coureuse."

"尽快找到她，舰长。" Baird 说，她转过身去开始打发你。"我们以后再多谈谈我正在为之努力的东西。"

你感觉到身后的门无声地打开了，头戴镜面面罩的警卫就像周围环境中的静电一样冒了出来，该动身了。

As you enter Baird's office, you notice Scylla Coureuse waiting in the sitting area. She nods in greeting as she folds up a portable workstation.

"Ah, Scylla. Good. Give me just a moment." Baird moves behind her desk, unlocks the interface, and taps in a command.

"Captain, allow me to properly compensate you for your good work," Baird says. "I trust this will help cover certain of your expenses."

She turns back to her desk interface and taps a few more keys, activating a holoprojector. A detailed progress report on Gargoyle's activities flickers into being, including time-tables for decrypting the Kallichore Archive.

Baird motions at the display, "Sebestyen is more capable than he appears. He is both persistent and meticulous."

Coureuse speaks up, "He's been very helpful in getting my new team set up."

Baird 点点头表示认同，Coureuse 继续道："看起来我们在大约一周内就能完全解密这份档案。我也许能重启我的...上一项研究，当然这取决于我们最先获得的资料是什么。"

Coureuse 看向了你。" Galatia 跳跃点实验 " 她开口到，说出了她上一个项目的名字，" 那种做法并不是我期望的。但是 Tomas 院长说时间太 —— "

Baird 打断道："院士，你不需要为自己辩解。舰长明白当我们进入实验阶段时，你们会准备好一切合理的预防措施。事实上，他们将在实验开展时收到详细说明。"
Baird 院长停顿了一下，看向你，观察你对她和 Coureuse 所说的话的反应。"舰长，你一定很想知道这一切是为了什么。"
options:
gaKA_return11b1:"Yes."
gaKA_return11b2:"Not really. The pay is good."
gaKA_return11b3:Say nothing.

text: Provost Baird pauses and turns to you, examining your reaction to what both she and Coureuse have said. "You must be wondering what this is all for, captain."
options:
gaKA_return11b1:"Yes."
gaKA_return11b2:"Not really. The pay is good."
gaKA_return11b3:Say nothing. You won't fall for this again.

text: She proceeds without regard for your response.
She proceeds without regard for your non-response.

"This is about opening up the galaxy again, captain. Yes, you see it now: the Gates. It was always about the Gates." 

Baird taps a datapad and the holoprojector flickers a 3D hyphae map into existence. You recognize the image- a map of the Domain-era gate network within the Persean Sector. A dense spot in one prominent lobe contains what you know as the Core Worlds.

"Or, more precisely, what the Gates can do," Baird says.

Coureuse speaks up, now, "It's about freedom! What the Domain used to dominate humanity, well, we can escape from this small, cruel world. We still live in their shadow, I mean- the Hegemony of course. But even Tri-Tachyon and the Luddics, they're all reactions to the power the Domain had. No one has truly escaped." 

Scylla Coureuse looks up at the slowly spinning gate network, "But maybe we can. All of us."

You notice that Baird has watched Coureuse without emotion through this speech. At its conclusion, the provost speaks to you in a tone of commanding finality, "Come back in a week or so, captain. My people need time to work. And you've earned a break. But keep your head down, the factions are restless after the job you pulled in Aztlan."

Baird turns to her desk console, expressions moving across her face as she appears to skim messages. "That is all, captain. And Scylla."
options:
gaKA_returnIntentions:"我想谈谈你对这项科技的意图。"
gaKA_returnLeave:离开

text:
Baird turns from her desk display and looks through you, "There is no 'technology', captain. Merely possibilities. And vast though those possibilities may be, they are yet mere possibilities."

She turns away again, dismissing you. "We shall speak of this later."

Coureuse gives you a sympathetic look as she packs up her portable workstation.

You feel the doors open soundlessly behind you, and the mirror-masked guards presence like a slight increase in static electricity. Time to go.

id: # Various bits of off-the-main-mission chain text for the Kallichore Archive characters
# Arroyo, custom contact conversation after this previous part has been played

text:
你发出了通讯请求，某种 速子科技 分部的商标在通讯得到应答前缓缓地转了半圈。

"这里是 Arroyo，你是哪位？" Rayan Arroyo 不以为然地看着你，他的目光就像在一艘豪华的星舰上寻找着划痕。
OR
"你带来的最好是好消息。" Rayan Arroyo 不以为然地看着你，"记得提醒我带你去买一套合适的西装，我认识一个能把西装做得很好看的人。"
OR
"这里是 Arroyo，有话快说。" Rayan Arroyo 看到是你，皱了皱眉。"喔，是你。这次又有什么事？"

id: # Talk to Rayan Arroyo re. Gargoyle after first contact

options: 10:gaKA_arroyoExpenses:"我已经找到了 Gargoyle，不过有一笔开支，现在我来找你报销了。"
10:gaKA_arroyoExpenses:"我已经找到了 Gargoyle，不过有一笔开支，现在我来找你报销了。"

text:
听到你这么说后 Arroyo 的脸变得更黑了。

"明白了。"他说到。

他举起了一根戴着金戒指的手指。"别再和我提关于 Gargoyle 的任何事，我很清楚自己并不想知道那个荒唐的破坏者在计划着什么。但我会给你报销。"他做了个鬼脸，"我会把我的发票寄给 Baird 院长，这样那个呆在象牙塔里的操偶大师就能明白她压榨我到什么程度了。"

"现在我要挂断了。"他关掉了通讯链接。

你输入通讯 ID，手悬停在发光的 "确认" 标志上。你的通讯技师点了点头，他已经准备好应对任何 Gargoyle 认为有趣的通讯内容了。

你的主屏幕从迷人而支离破碎的电子战场变成了一张神态夸张，顽皮地向你咧嘴笑着的脸。"啊，$playerFirstName ! 你回来是为了找些有趣的事情做吗？我有各种各样的好主意。"

id: # Talk to Gargoyle after asked to get hack device, but haven't done it

text:
你输入通讯 ID，手悬停在发光的 "确认" 标志上。通讯技师点了点头，对方已经准备好应对任何 Gargoyle 可能为了找乐子而发过来的惊喜内容了。

你的主屏幕从迷人而支离破碎的电子战场变成了一张神态夸张，顽皮地向你咧嘴笑着的脸。"喔，$playerFirstName，你找不到新 Maxios 了？让我帮帮你吧，我会给你一张婴儿都能看懂的星际地图。"

你的 TriPad 响起了轻柔的铃声。

"读下去，读下去。找到 'M开头的 Magec'。你能搞明白的！我相信你。" Gargoyle 转过身去并挥手示意你离开，接着你的通讯链接自动断开了。

id: # Talk to Gargoyle after got transmitter, not installed

text:
你输入通讯 ID，手悬停在发光的 "确认" 标志上。你的通讯技师点了点头，他已经准备好应对任何 Gargoyle 认为有趣的通讯内容了。

你的主屏幕上显示出了一张神态夸张，顽皮地向你咧嘴笑着的脸，没有发生任何意外。"啊，$playerFirstName 舰长！你一定是忘了我简单的提示。"

Gargoyle 数着手指，"第一步，收集设备。你做到了，万岁！第二步，把它安装在位于 Aztlan 星系的 —— 现在注意了，也许你该让你愁眉紧锁的通讯员做个备忘录 —— Aztlan 中继站里。第三步，回到我这里来拿你宝贵的数据档案。"

黑客用剩下的两根手指粗鲁地朝你挥了挥。"事情就是这样。再见，我现在很忙。"

你的通讯链接自动断开了。

options: 10:gaKA_tellBaird1:告诉 Baird 关于 Gargoyle 黑掉 霸主 通讯中继站的计划

text:
Baird 院长耐心地听着你的解释。当你说完时，她等了一会儿，然后干脆地说："舰长，我只需要你完成任务，不关心你的每一步行动，如果这个 'Gargoyle' 是我久仰大名的那个，那么我们得到 Kallichore 的档案的可能性就很大了。"

"你的行动方针很明显：帮助黑客，用任何必要的手段，不惜任何代价。"她的语气就像失望的老师，"你肯定不需要我来告诉你这些。"

options: 10:gaKA_tellBaird2:告诉 Baird 关于 Gargoyle 黑掉霸主通讯中继站的计划

text:
Baird 院长耐心地听着你的解释。当你说完时，她等了一会儿，然后干脆地说："舰长，我只需要你完成任务，不需要知道你的每一步行动。"

"你的行动方针很明确：帮助黑客，用任何必要的手段，不惜任何代价。" Baird 看向了她桌上的显示屏，确认着她的日程表。看起来你该走了。

你伸手想切断通讯，这时她补充道，"把这个黑客设备的规格参数发到我的办公室，我很感兴趣。"

options: 10:gaKA_tellBaird3:告诉 Baird 黑客装置已经安装完成了

text: "你安装了黑客装置，回来之前却没有从 Gargoyle 那里拿到解密的 Kallichore 的档案？" Baird 摘下眼镜站起身来，她平时的冷静消失得无影无踪，"现在快去！抢在别人之前拿到档案！你还等什么，快！"

id: # talk to Scylla Coureuse, any time after she's at the academy

options: gaKA_courBaird:"Do you think Baird can be trusted?"
gaKA_courAskAbtCavin:"Your friend Cavin doesn't seem like the type that would ever work for Baird."
gaKA_courAskAbtZal:"Have you been in contact with Elissa Zal lately?"

text:
She looks at you for a moment then sighs, "You know she'll probably listen to this, right? Well, she knows how I feel, and I'm not going to pretend I believe otherwise. I don't like a lot about what she does and how she does it."

"Say what you will about the provost, she's... effective. It's better than any alternative I've seen so far."

"I don't know," she says, "Making weapons for the Hegemony? Sector collapse to pre-hyperdrive levels? Torturing AI shards for Tri-Tach? I couldn't do that. I don't even know what the Luddics would make of me."

Coureuse gives a laugh, "Put me in a nunnery, probably. Might not be so bad."

"Cavin." She just pauses for a moment, looking up and elsewhere. Then she smiles a little, and shakes her head.

"No, he wouldn't. He'd get on with Baird like a hull breach, that's for sure. Um. Why do you ask?"
options:
gaKA_courAskAbtCavinA:"I was wondering if you shared his... views."
gaKA_courAskAbtCavinB:"He seems... unreliable. You were close, once."
gaKA_courAskAbtCavinC:"I apologize, it is not my business."

text:
"Ah," she lets out an awkward laugh. "I see. He has a way of making an impression, doesn't he. That's why he was so... um."

She shakes her head once, then looks at you brightly; a facade pulled over whatever her true feelings are. "Well, captain," she says, "I'm not still there in that art collective, am I?"
options:
gaKA_courAskAbtCavinA2a:"I suppose not."
gaKA_courAskAbtCavinA2:"That's a question, not an answer."

text:
The moment draws out. "Um," she looks away, then rapidly taps on her lab-interface, flooding the view with holographic data-tables. "I really must be getting back to work. Good-bye."

The feed flickers and a generic Galatia Academy holding signal appears.

"Unreliable... I mean, yes, he was that," she admits. "He just has different priorities than most people. He doesn't really align with, well, institutions. It's what made him so... well, he was exciting, that's for sure." She looks down for a moment, "But at some point... if you're not his priority, when it's really important, well, that's the end of that."

"Um," she blinks several times, like waking up from a dream. "I really should get back to work." Coureuse rapidly taps on several interfaces, flooding the view with holographic data-tables. "Good-bye captain."

The feed flickers and a generic Galatia Academy holding signal appears.

"I don't mind. That was all a few cycles ago, anyway." 

A pause, then she says, "It is actually kind of nice to hear that he's still, well, being Cavin."

"No, I..." She blinks rapidly. "Of course not. The, the equipment was all back in the Isirah system..."

She taps at some command interfaces and a flood of data tables fills the screen. "I really must get back to work, captain. Sorry. Good-bye."

The feed flickers and a generic Galatia Academy holding signal appears.

"Oh, very helpful," she says with a smile, "You get a, just a really different perspective from Gargoyle. There are so many assumptions, invisible little things we do, um, as an institutional organization without realizing, and - well, and also the technical stuff, like code. It's been - hmm, a bit strange. And teamwork in the traditional sense is mostly out of the question. But if we find a little self-contained project for Gargoyle, it can work out great."

"Thank you for all you've done for us. It could have gone very poorly."

script:
unset $global.gaKA_triTachyonVisit
FireBest BarShuttleDownPrintDesc
FireBest BarPrintDesc
BarCMD playAmbience

SaveCurrentVisual
BeginConversation tt_fixer false true
# so that the text can use person tokens - otherwise, text is added before the script runs
FireBest GAKA_TTStart

text:
当你扫视人群寻找潜在的工作机会时，穿着一尘不染的 速子 高管服装的$manOrWoman神不知鬼不觉地出现在了你面前。

" $playerName，我们很高兴看到您的到来。速子科技 公司十分重视您对当地经济的贡献，"$heOrShe边握着你的手边露出了完美的微笑。

"我们能换个地方吗？我想讨论一件特殊的事...公司业务。"
options:
gaKA_ttAsk:问问发生什么事了
gaKA_ttFollow:跟上速子科技特工

text:
不知怎么的，速子 特工的笑容变得更加灿烂而完美。"我们只想搞清一些事情，您并没有陷入麻烦中。"

"请，"$heOrShe拉开了窗帘，窗帘下是一个你之前根本没有注意到的私人客座，"我们可以为您提供免费茶点。"
options:
gaKA_ttFollow:跟上特工
gaKA_ttLeave:"谢谢，但是不用。我这就要走了。"

text:
The perfect smile twitches, then reaffirms itself, stronger than before.

"I'm sure we'll speak again, Captain $playerName," $heOrShe says with plastic cheer. "And on behalf of the Tri-Tachyon Corporation I would like to thank you for your visit."

你离开了桌子，饮料都没碰一下。速子 特工的视线跟着你，脸上看不到一丝笑意。

当转身想要离开时，你感觉到脖子后面传来了刺痛感。

You stand from the table, drink untouched.

You almost feel like there's a tingle on the back of your neck as you leave, but the Tri-Tachyon agent is nowhere to be seen.

你漫不经心地从菜单上点昂贵的饮料，几秒钟内它就出现在了你面前。

特工注意到了你的惊讶，解释说："每个顾客在享受我们的产品时，我们都会建立速子口味档案。将购买饮料的时间和其他特定的生理信号联系起来，并以此 —— "$heOrShe举了举$hisOrHer的手以示歉意，"我有时会失控，让客户满意是我的追求。"

你明白他想表达什么：你正在被监视着。

"我们是来谈你的事的。"特工用手轻轻地指了指你，"不是我的事。"
options:
gaKA_ttBusiness:"我的什么事？"
gaKA_ttAppreciate:"我可不喜欢被监视。"

text:
"最近发生了一起事故，Aztlan 中继站被瘫痪了。对于 HEGCOM 来说这非常尴尬，他们已经有过类似遭遇了。而随着这种尴尬而来的会是过激反应的倾向 —— 考虑到他们对 速子科技 的偏见，那对象会是我们。我们认为不愉快的 AI 战争都是过去时了，现在还有生意要做呢。"

特工的笑容消失了，语气变得冰冷起来："我们的股东可能会损失惨重，因此我们不能允许紧张局势被...冒险行动所激化。"$HisOrHer的眼睛眯了起来，"我也没指望 Galatia 的现任院长能在她的岗位上呆多久，考虑一下你应该和谁合作。"
options:
gaKA_ttOffer:"你是在给我开价吗？"
gaKA_ttAppreciate:"我可不喜欢被监视。"
gaKA_ttLeaveToBar:"知道了。谢谢你的饮料。"(离开)

text:
接下来的很长一段时间对方都没有做出任何回应。然后特工的微笑又出现了。

"我很高兴您能接受这个建议，"$heOrShe说，然后站了起来。"我敢肯定公司会和您保持联络的。谢谢您的时间，$playerName。我相信您会继续尊重我们在 速子科技 星区以及其他地方培育的商业友好环境。"

速子 特工消失在阴影中。你看着你那杯没碰过的饮料，一个气泡缓缓地上升，并在触及液面时破裂了。

特工又一次露出了$heOrShe那完美的微笑。

"进入 速子科技 星区的行为表明您已经同意了某些条款和条件，您明白我在说什么。此外，"$heOrShe维持着微笑。"考虑到一直以来的伙伴关系，我认为您了解的远不止于此。"
options:
gaKA_ttNothing:保持沉默
gaKA_ttBaird:"这是关于 Baird 和 Galatia 学院的事？还是 Gargoyle? 又或者 Arroyo?"
gaKA_ttLeaveToBar:"知道了。谢谢你的饮料。"(离开)

text:
$HeOrShe stands, leveling $hisOrHer eyes down at you "The Tri-Tachyon Corporation thanks you for your business and wishes you safe travels. I'm sure you will continue to respect the business-friendly environment we cultivate in Tri-Tachyon space and beyond."

The Tri-Tachyon agent disappears into some shadow. You look at your untouched drink. A bubble breaks onto the surface.

The agent looks nervous, breaking $hisOrHer facade and looking around as if for eavesdroppers.

"That's quite enough, captain," $heOrShe says somewhat more loudly, cutting you off, "I think we've all said our part." $HeOrShe stands, leveling $hisOrHer eyes down at you "The Tri-Tachyon Corporation thanks you for your business and we wish you safe travels. 

The Tri-Tachyon agent disappears into some shadow. You look at your untouched drink. A bubble breaks onto the surface.

script:
unset $global.gaKA_hegemonyVisit
FireBest BarShuttleDownPrintDesc
FireBest BarPrintDesc
BarCMD playAmbience

BeginConversation heg_agent false true
# so that the text can use person tokens - otherwise, text is added before the script runs
FireBest GAKA_HegStart

text:
你开始扫视人群，寻找线索。当环视房间时，你的目光突然锁定在了一个穿着霸主制服的$manOrWoman身上。只见$HeOrShe把手抬到了胸前指了指你，同时对身边身着制服的公众管控警官说了些什么。

你立即转身想去找一个不那么显眼的出口，却看到了更多的公控警员。从他们的姿势来看，你推测他们已经用轻武器瞄准了你的保镖，你的保镖也以同样的方式做出回应。

轻型战术外骨骼的剪影出现在了正门方向，你望过去，正好看到了近红外瞄准激光束正在扫视目标的闪动。顾客们都意识到了事态不对，房间里的谈话声被一片死寂所取代，唯有全息影像还在发出噪声。在你看清当下的形势的同时，常年太空战斗磨练出来的直觉就不自觉地帮你把时间放缓了。

顾客们都努力地强装出一幅随意的样子，低着头离开了酒吧。这些人全都像是突然想起自己还有约，已经没时间喝完饮料了。

"我为这失礼的状况表示抱歉，$playerName 舰长。"那位 霸主 军官一边走过来一边说道。$HeOrShe有一口悦耳的 Eventide 学院口音，应该是位军中翘楚。

"这是规矩。"$heOrShe摆出一副好比自己身不由己的样子说到。你感觉到一群沉默公控警员在你身后靠了过来。霸主 军官挥手示意让他们退下，然后对你说："我们坐下来谈谈吧。就当是 霸主 请你喝一杯。你应该很乐意，对吧？"

在这件事上你似乎别无选择。在了解情况之前，你最好配合一下。

酒保冷汗直冒,把两杯酒放在你们之间的桌子上之后就快步走开了。

"我相信你已经听说 Aztlan 星系最近发生了不愉快的事，对吧？数据泄露，那还真是件可怕的事情。你知道以史为鉴吗，舰长？在历史上这种事件就是所谓的战争的导火索，因此我们非常想确保我们的调查结果是...确凿无误的。"

"我们知道当时你的$shipOrFleet就在附近 —— 当然，"$heOrShe笑了，看上去还挺愉快的，"我并不是在指控你。我只是想唤起你的爱国精神，报告一下你是否有...看到任何东西。就如一名遵纪守法的好公民一样。"

options: gaKA_hegDidntSee:"我确定当时没看到任何东西，阁下。"
gaKA_hegHacked:"你逮到我了，正是我黑入了 Aztlan 中继站。"
gaKA_hegGoons:"爱国精神，是吧？只是这样的话那群打手是怎么回事？"
gaKA_hegTriTach:"看起来 速子科技 又一次打败了你们。"
gaKA_hegArrest:"我被逮捕了吗？没有的话我可以走了吗？"

text:
"的确，"$heOrShe皱起眉头盯着你。"如果我们检查一下你的传感器日志，也许会发现一些你没注意到的东西。"

但这需要搜查令，而搜查令需要非常明确的不法行为证据。霸主 当然可以凌驾于任何条件之上，他们也可以制造条件，但你知道他们的官僚机构行动缓慢。

"你见过或者听说过任何叫 'Gargoyle' 的人吗？你知道，提供信息可是有大量报酬的。"
霸主军官皱了皱眉头。"我可不是来对严重的安全漏洞开玩笑的，舰长。我知道你名声在外，那让你十分值得关注。在霸主开始认真对待你之前，你最好低调一些。"

霸主 官员假笑了一下，然后对着$hisOrHer的袖口说了一句什么。你注意到满屋子公控警员都消失了。"还请您原谅我的手下。我的一些...同事们对我们的会议形式曾提出过一些不同的建议。现在我们已经谈妥了。"

$HeOrShe自然地看了看你："我主张的是非正式的聊天，舰长。那样对你我和 霸主 都有好处。"

$HeOrShe对着$hisOrHer的袖口说了句什么。你听到了 "浪费时间" 这样的话。

霸主官员突然站了起来，撞到桌子并让一些没喝过的饮料洒了出来。"滚出这个酒吧。如果我们发现你与其他什么 '神秘事件' 有关，我向你保证，我们不会再这么仁慈了。"

$HeOrShe怒气冲冲地走出了前门，酒保则面无表情地看了你一眼。
options:
gaKA_hegLeaveSorry:"我很抱歉。"
gaKA_hegJustLeave:径直离去

text:
"你没有被捕，公民，"官员如此承认道，但$heOrShe的脸随着逐渐涌上的怒火变得僵硬起来，"你知道，我只是想让谈话轻松一点。霸主 的安全确保了整个星域的安全 —— 人们能自由地贸易、生活以及生存。与 霸主 过去所面临的情况相比，现在是个好时代。舰长，别在这里树敌。"

霸主 官员突然站了起来，撞到桌子并让一些没喝的饮料洒了出来。"如果我们发现你与另一起 '神秘事件' 有关，我向你保证，我们不会再这么仁慈了，把这当作官方警告吧。"

$HeOrShe大步走出了前门，酒保则面无表情地看了你一眼。
options:
gaKA_hegLeaveSorry:"我很抱歉。"
gaKA_hegJustLeave:径直离去

text: 酒保缓缓摇了摇头。今天的生意没了，没什么好说的。

id: # Finding Coureuse story mission, aka gaFC

options: 10:gaFC_BairdSwitchToProbes:告诉 Baird 你想改变寻找 Coureuse 的方法

text: "Oh?" Baird's tone is neutral, behind it you can only feel the weight of an unresolved quantum state of judgment. "If you want to change your approach, make sure that this is your final decision, captain."
options:
gaFC_BairdSwitchToProbesFinal:"我想用探索的方法来处理这事。"
gaFC_BairdSwitchNeverMind:"当我没说。"

script:
$global.gaFC_switchedPaths = true
$global.gaFC_pickedBranchProbes = true
Call $global.gaFC_ref updateStage
FireAll PopulateOptions
text:
"很好，"她说，"那就探索吧。我会确保你能得到执行调整后的任务所需的资料。"

Baird 把目光投向了她桌上的显示屏，读着什么东西。"舰长，我猜你没别的事了吧？"

options: 10:gaFC_BairdSwitchToFikenhild:告诉 Baird 你想改变寻找 Coureuse 的方法

text: "Oh?" Baird's tone is neutral, behind it you can only feel the weight of an unresolved quantum state of judgment. "If you're sure you want to change your approach, make sure that this is your final decision, captain."
options:
gaFC_BairdSwitchToFikenhildFinal:"我想用外交谈话的方法来处理这事。"
gaFC_BairdSwitchNeverMind:"当我没说。"

script:
$global.gaFC_switchedPaths = true
$global.gaFC_pickedBranchFikenhild = true
Call $global.gaFC_ref updateStage
FireAll PopulateOptions
text:
"很好，"她说，"那就外交谈话吧。我会确保你能得到执行调整后的任务所需的资料。"

Baird 把目光投向了她桌上的显示屏，读着什么东西。"舰长，我猜你没别的事了吧？"

options: 2:gaFC_visitFikenhild:搭乘穿梭机到地面上并寻找和 Coureuse 有关联的人。

text:
在波光粼粼的海面上，你的穿梭机穿过风暴云柱后开始下降，航向了 "Kay-arco" —— Fikenhild 的巨型生态理想城。你开始回顾 Baird 给出的与 Coureuse 有关联的人的名单，穿梭机上的阻尼力场将进入大气层的噪音减小到了耳语一般的程度。

Adonya Coureuse 被标记为调查目标依然在世的家人，对方住在一个退休人员区。

从她开始调查似乎不错。

你开始回顾 Baird 给出的与 Coureuse 有关联并住在 Fikenhild 上的人的名单。

Bione Lata 是目标的一位 "儿时玩伴"，住在一个远郊社区。

也许她对 Scylla Coureuse 早期的个人交际网络了解得更多。至少任何其他顺着类似线索进行追查的特工都应该联系过 Bione。

You review Baird's list of Coureuse's associates on Fikenhild. 

Cavin Pharoh's file has an attached file about an event at some kind of art co-op operated by undercity radicals.
